description: Tells the story of young Tom,  crippled and lame, under a merciless granny. His journey is really amazingA must read pamphlet.

title: 大道燃燈
author: 理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
description: 大道燃燈 編輯誌 大道系列天書第十八冊《大道燃燈》，就是把自己垢穢思惟，在沉淪淨化，這種必要明白對降生所作為後思惟，正是重新來加以改造，又對自己能有淨染要求，在對有情眾佛子降生世界，真正改除往昔所有之不良氣習。 更對自己能作到淨化作為，這是很如實性的，就是以降生凡塵眾佛子來言：其靈性對自己缺陷當中來明晰，如何對「垢染」作一個清除沉澱作用，必要引用對第八意識淨化清除，才是讓沉澱作用又能如何？ 必要達至對靈性本身所要求作淨化，在對所有之眾原靈佛子，為何降生凡塵世界？就是要把累世垢穢清除！若不能經由大道系列，明晰往昔理天世界或昊天世界，眾口悠悠，又難明白：真正降落凡塵之障礙，是在何處！ 這又對大寰世界芸芸眾佛子來言，就是以淨化靈性為根基，在 上蒼為何要眾佛子等，降下凡塵眾原靈佛子原因與癥結點，又是在於何處？也因為垢穢靈性，根本都難以生存在：理天世界、昊天世界！ 必會降於氣天世界，這是相當正確，以及理所當然之條件，一個靈性污垢存在於理天世界，又如何達至清淨與淨化否？不也！這種靈性在理天世界，根本都難以生存，又降生至氣天世界，則是稍可存活。 人類眾生又是較接近象天世界，就是很容易來遭受蒙垢，正是有情眾原靈佛子之基因本質，也就是人類所言：基因本質，這種因質若是不良，如何能存活於氣天世界？也因存在氣天世界，正是一個比較清淨天界。 這種氣天世界之氣質，比起象天之地球星系來觀：正是清淨良多，如此對有情眾原靈下降於象天世界，又是對身軀較能有符合於生存所必須，也對這種靈性，根本都會因地球星系：水、風兩者，來加以摧殘。 就是把一個先天－黃綾彩帶，也就是原靈彩帶，來消失一乾二淨，又這種在對地球星系「水、風」這兩者所有影響，若是以氣天世界之神祇，必會有一種保護動作功能，促成對所有存在依歸過程。 加以對自己生存取向有一個依附動作，如此靈性則易受於地球星系所產生之「水、風」兩者來加以蒙垢，也在人類身上亦復如是，不相信大家可在洗完澡後，簡短數分鐘之後，再把身軀搓一搓又如何？ 仍會有一股細微之土質！又這種情況再怎麼洗，皆是如此，即有一個地球星系之：水、風兩者，所產生塵土質量所作用，就是把塵土質量之因質，來散播整體地球星系當中，若能言：不受蒙垢，那更是不可能的！ 軀體本質是要作提昇，而把往昔所有不良氣質來加以淨化，經由對自己身軀上基因本質作明晰，又在人類基質是以土之成形，加以水火來包裹，必要有一個風之主導，才是對軀體能有下一個：行為動作！ 正是由靈性投入其身體當中；為何有情世道人類世界當中，經由土之基質於身軀，而必要有「水、火」兩者相互交濟，把一個風之主導於靈性投入，即是人類世界空氣作用，若是一息不來，又是如何？ 喔！原來就是死翹翹了，又人類眾生也就是太容易死翹翹了，這種困擾在於人類世界當中是如何？若僅是簡短百年身軀，那大家要否？當然不要！但又奈何，不如此，又能提昇超越？難也！更難也！ 人類軀體本是如此，為何 上蒼要有情眾生（佛子）作淨化本意，即是如此的讓自己達至靈性種因所有淨化過程，若是無法達至靈性種因作淨化，永遠只在凡塵世界生存而已，是對軀體土質作基因，皆是如此！ 如果又很難以作提昇超越作為，也就是有情眾原靈佛子所有之悲哀，若言不如此，又如何能真正有往上來提昇超越否？乃是一個提昇靈性種因根本來乘越，正是對「種因篩選」重要性，就有重新思惟所要求。 理心光明禪師 《大道燃燈》再版前 大道燃燈 推薦序 人類眾生對一個往昔在理天世界與昊天世界，也就是「靈性種因」作相加污穢，加以清除與沉澱！就對此種所要求的，正是大寰世 界所有眾原靈（佛子）等，心裡就很難明白的，這種條件若僅在宗教，只有甚少信仰皈依。 不見得會真正明白與了知，也就是因為如此，促成所有進入於宗教信仰之後，仍是難以真正達至超脫輪迴障礙所限制，是讓宗教信仰所形成困擾，正是越來越多，在這種對信仰所有全心投入之後，又是如何？ 也就難以對自己有「靈性種因」淨化作用，請問有情眾原靈（佛子）時：能有幾位可以真正明白，在人道世界所有主要障礙是如何？難也！就是因為「靈性種因」在有情眾佛子是最難以明白的，又根本都沒有這種觀念！ 也在眾原靈佛子來觀：真是可笑的！又眾原靈佛子是有真正提昇，才言：佛子！不然只可言：眾靈子（眾生）而已，假如在「靈性種因」若不淨化，更對自己佛性又難以彰顯，反而在對自己魔性，很容易納入於生存當中。 這是對大寰世界有情眾靈子，能否了知如此障礙，來存在生存取向當中？又對靈性本質，應該相當清淨與清澈才對，但對大寰世界芸芸眾原靈來言：降生於凡塵世界，反而是越來越糟糕，也越來越難以提昇！ 上蒼觀此，降下諸多佛聖仙神於凡塵世界，作引導渡化動作，方方闡教處處開堂，難以真正教導下化眾原靈佛子來回歸，這種障礙對降凡眾原靈佛子，正是另一個悲哀；正是要把靈性種因加以篩選，將其污穢作用來淨化。 如何讓此種條件，真正對眾原靈佛子來受益？則是對 上蒼此期最大聖務，是以這種靈性種因所篩選與淨化，必要真正有受益；讓眾原靈佛子可以一世中作乘越，而不是一再反覆輪迴於人道世界。 這也是 上蒼此期借將作用，最大之困擾問題，如何對於「青、紅」兩期，所降下四億佛子來回歸？就是經由 上蒼降下大道天梯作乘越，而不是流浪於六道輪迴，或是反覆沉淪於人道世界，來生存而已！ 這是為何眾仙佛一再憂心的！此種情況在於地球先前一、二元會，亦是如此，為何在此三期元會，必要作引渡於下降芸芸眾原靈佛子來回歸，這才是真正替 上蒼、替仙佛、替眾生、替後代，作一個千秋大業聖務。 必要經由象天世界，把：水、風兩者所污穢，加以清除沉澱，如果不沉澱，將是一堆堆來往上累積，必讓有情眾原靈佛子，反覆沉淪於地球星系當中， 上蒼對此問題透過「大道系列天書」將困擾因素來化除。 這是人類世界在此三期龍華，所必要有之動作，又對大道系列所闡述的，將是窮千百世皆難以達至之因緣，如此在對－大道系列所著作，正是流傳於千百年之後，仍可以作乘越所有主要依據。 回歸乘越作圓滿超越當中，必要有真正教化功能以及福祉德澤，這是 上蒼在此元會，真正提昇有情眾原靈佛子，作回歸超越原動力，是以科技文明來彰顯，針對整體大寰宇宙德澤。 正是把科技文明作更大提昇，又以科技創造無窮德澤與福祉作依歸，給予有情世界芸芸眾原靈，達至能有成長學習基礎，又以科技文明作此元會來提昇，正是把第一元會與第二元會，殊勝要求與目標動作。 是以大寰世界作成長要求，把人類世界在此元會中，引動於第一元會、第二元會所有科技文明來彰顯，就會創造可「移地他化或是移化他地」之要求，是對地球空間文明作依歸，這是在對科技所彰顯來成就。 要把過往所有科技文明障礙，來加以摒除，又是以科技德澤，創造後代眾原靈佛子福祉作成全，就是把過去所有元會之創造，能達至對大寰世界，作提昇、作超越、作圓滿、作回歸之成長。 理心光明禪師題於 《大道燃燈》再版前

title: Wonderful Creatures: Children! Have You Ever Thought? 3
author: Harun Yahya
Italo Calvino
David M. Nathan
Linda Delahanty

title: 大道演繹
author: 理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
Haridas Mukherjee
Uma Mukherjee
description: #大道演繹 編輯誌 大道系列天書第十一冊《大道演繹》對人類眾生基本作用，在人世間裡面結合人類的生存，提供宗教信仰良好的提昇增長，在日常生活能有更實際作用，這種的依持對「知識及智慧」提昇，也超越在圓融之境界。 大道系列天書第十一冊《大道演繹》的目錄，是由人類要先把：大道演化、演繹實相、創造創進、進化改造、澤被蒼生、眷顧有情、上蒼德澤、大寰天地、濟化導引、公平滋潤、天覆地載、天佑地護、有情眾生的。 人世間所有良善好德性，必要具備有：鴻慈眷顧、天地有情、眾生濟渡、萬物生存、權利均等、皆有所長、長短各具、陰陽相待、陰陽兩利、乾坤皆益，男女有別、乾坤夫婦、幸福家庭、傳承後代、生育教養之傳承。 人類眾生的生存是必要有：德性為先、齊家治國、安定天下、宗教信仰、信仰平等、修持改造、大道演繹，才可能在每個人，先具足造就「陰騭德性」的機會，形成了「大道演繹」之演化，對一切進化的提昇超越。 大道演化過程來了知，在對大寰天地眾星辰定位，是相互攸關的，就由芸芸眾生所有生存實相，能有千真萬確相關必需性，正是由一切演化過程，融合大道所含包一切事相，皆離不開人類生存「取向」之過程。 如何給予有情眾生，作更大福祉與創造，針對有情眾生的生存取向，是由福祉德性所創發，又在此種條件該如何滋潤人類生存，而有舒適安穩生活空間？就在日常中不會形成恐懼的產生，才是演化如實性。 演繹：是把一切生存取向，在人類世界來成就，又對所成就「取向與須求」的，必需要由人類世界作「向取之動作」裡面，針對人類世界所須求，就由目標來達成，又 上蒼是攸關人類所欲求，達成向取目標作下化。 若無法在人類世界，用人類生存方式所努力，而一味依靠 上蒼或是仙佛來賜予，也就不知該如何給予眾生大福祉？人類正是有創造與創進動能，在所應用方式必要由人類自己作創造與創進，才是如實的！ 科技文明了，把原本「無之中」東西來「生有了」，又對大道所演繹過程提供演化成長，正是讓有情眾生在生存性向，可以作到真正實際應用條件，在對演繹正確性，給予由演化過程作到更大發揮，才是正確！ 實相：是把演化過程，通過人類世界所造就，必可由「無中來生有」、「有中來成長」、「成長中學習」相互關連，這種條件由科技文明，能了知「前人經驗」累積，對人世間改造與創進，相互融合人類之取捨。 大道演化的真實面，必要通過環境所造就與創進，又在當下近30餘載時光當中，能把過去原有訛陋來修整，是對整體建設經由人類所創進與造作，可具足一切舒適之改造，正是提昇人類生存舒適方便、普及性。 人世間給予有情人類不論：上天、下海之大道路途，經由：食、衣、住、行、育、樂，具足四千年的福祉，當下有情眾生是福分所臻之環境，把大道演化下化在人間，正是拜科技文明所恩賜，才能有此契機。 福澤依求：對大道演化真實性，是有 上蒼來主導所有大寰天地，萬物眾生所依循福祉可作創造與創進，也由研究發明創造，針對人類「大福祉」發明了很多物資，給予有情眾生，作更大福祉之必須性與欲求。 就可在大道演繹過程，累積：福、祿、壽、富、貴所成就；其作用給予有情眾生，是以「德性為先」作依憑，更以 上蒼對大寰天地之規範，訂定人倫條綱，是以「有德能司火、無私可昇天」的提昇。 幸福生活：來開創整個美滿婚姻的家庭，作傳承教育後代之使命，又生育教養是為最重要，必以「德性為先」的基礎，在大寰天地所有人種皆要有基本理念，由教育、教化課程能以傳承後代，累積深厚之德性。 理心光明禪師 題於《大道演繹》天書再版前 #大道演繹 推薦序 人類世界來觀，該如何創造有情眾生，能常享福祉更綿遠；就以「陰騭德性」是在人類世界，方能具足及創造的，人類世界可以通過生存條件，來具足對德性提昇，給予有情眾生可由此世界作成長受益。 此種條件，創造有情眾生福祉作依歸，讓自己在生存取向的創造無限德澤，也對有情世界所形成，能以長處即是優點，又在短處即是缺點，正是由不足、欠缺與錯誤，該如何在不足作改造，而由修整往上提昇超越。 人類世界就是「生命改造界」的，如何破除對自己不足來改造，必要自己親身下定決心，才能改變所有缺點與不足及錯誤，外在條件會讓每一位眾生皆是如此，是對未來能有豐富經驗資糧，正是人類所造就。 能了知自己所不足與短處，就是要將缺點來改進，而有一種修持者之必要性，是要有「羞恥者」之心態作為修持，即在修持之心，作自己修持精進的提昇，是對「自信心者」有一種向上之原動力，是為良好的！ 禮運大同篇–就有真正切實陳述，在：壯有所長，老有所用，更在對鰥寡孤獨皆有所養，達至「不獨親其親，不獨子其子」中，對大同世界有一個真正楷模，給予人類世界能建立21世紀蓮花佛國淨土世界。 如何讓自己在平等作用，達至無分高低、無分別大小之大同世界；更在對整體地球村就能有提昇與平等，才是最重要，否則，針對每一個宗教都是標榜自己，更且把其他宗教來貶低，此種即難以達至平等作用。 生存過程：若無法通過自己親身經驗，必難對一切生存過程，給予有豐富經驗與體證，也在大寰天地有情眾生皆是 上蒼所濟化導引，甚且正是公正平等來滋潤有情眾生，所有生存之取向而往良善作增長。 濟化導引有情眾生之作為，是把眾生生存取向，對潤生所必須來論斷，又在人世間成就自己學習經驗，必要能以親身體證對一切：酸、甜、苦、辣、甘、澀之經驗，正是由人世間能有真正經驗作累積。 教化傳承：僅是人類世界所能應用而已，又其他物種眾生皆難有此建構，該如何達至性向了別與經驗累積，就是以成長經驗作豐盈資糧，對其他眾生也無法親身體證，而且，若欠缺人類身軀具備，只是無形來存在。 在對地球一切有情眾生，能安適存在天地當中，正是承受天地定位，而有天之日辰、天之月辰、天之星辰、地之廣泛、地之物博，地之豐厚，在風調雨順、地靈火合，皆是天地定位所必要有之主體聖務。 公平滋潤：正是 上蒼大德澤，不論任何物種眾生亦復如是的生存於世，因公平、公正正是 上蒼基本主體，若對 上蒼厚人類而薄其他有情眾生之時，在對此世界公正平等性，也就無所比擬之殘忍對待。 必要明白公正平等，正是 上蒼大慈悲德澤於此天地之間，也滋潤天地有情眾生，就會通過了「地、水、火、風」的調合性，正是在「風調水順」之中，讓芸芸眾生能符合生存必需性，更且符合大地博愛性。 天之大德：是好生，地之大德：是養生與育生，人之大德：是放生與護生，不論任何物種皆是公平滋潤的，對於此天地所存在人種與萬物，都會有很多德澤下化在於人世間，這就是 上蒼大德澤的基本架構。 天地人三達德，若能相互並融生存在一起，而不會以人類科技殘害有情萬物蒼生，必要讓人類世界仁慈德性來彰顯，理應在教育、教化所傳承，給予心念作建構，如何了知大道演化與演繹德澤，正是利益萬靈蒼生！ 未來21世紀可以言：正是中國人之世紀，中土炎黃子孫就是以「道德」結合全世界，並非是以「槍砲」來統治全世界！如此 上蒼之原意正是將人世間，重新改造更良好「陰騭」的新時代，諦造全世界之領導者。 理心光明禪師 題於 大道系列第十一冊再版前

title: 大道有情
author: 理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
description: #大道有情 編輯誌 大道系列天書第十二冊《大道有情》，在人類所有生存條件，對人世間所組合因果循環，提供宗教信仰有良好增長提昇，這種因緣能有更實際作用，將人類邁向對因緣果報所追償，不分別「善德與惡報」皆是如此！ 《大道有情》是邀請由冥府 十大閻羅天子所著作，對千百年來甚少剖析的天機奧秘，開示於人世間，提供人類所有良善增長，由無明業障的因果報償追尋造業者，讓大家都能明白如影隨形所追償，區分討報的分差。 上蒼慈悲德澤，在近幾百年來修整過往討報公律，改變「隔空撥轉」形成果報清償的方式，就有「輪迴再造」的修整，化解很多眾生甚難往上增長之局限，提供善德有心者，可以在一世人中作提昇超越。 大道系列天書第十二冊–《大道有情》的目錄，由人類要先把：大寰天下、有情教化、智慧提昇、創造進化、研究發明、改善環境、提昇品質、精益求精、高等價值、價值觀念、價值追尋、價值確立之高層次作用。 人世間所有因果必要有天地來評判：認定標準、境界層次、善惡分差、福禍淵源、因果報應、如影隨形、絲毫不漏、業因討報、因果循環、點點滴滴、皆有報償、時空旋轉、因果追隨、報償完清，又如何清償的？ 此種過程正是必要產生：隔空感應、撥轉改造、果報清償、討報分差、輪迴再造、輪迴提昇、有情討報、干擾靈體、一切討報，針對人類所存在的造業，這種條件一般眾生根本難了知，何者是：大道有情之變異！ 當下科技文明所提昇，針對有情眾生在生存依附，將產品「精益求精」改良創造，又在改良創造後加以外表包裝華麗，就可以由「新穎造形」給人類喜愛，這種因緣是要經過規劃設計的，也是當今人類所興盛。 品質提昇：是對自己『第八意識－心王』中，即可由人類所喜歡的物品，邁向一個更高層次的提昇，對生存習性皆受往昔認知而已，也受到物品的迷思，形成人類眾生所有的喜歡，是在此種認知所應該如此！ 在對品質提昇，是一步步來邁向生存環境改善過程，才是如實性，又對自己認知與喜歡的條件，正是由自己生存所學習經驗，能否以真正「勝義理諦」作主導，而不是只一在「世俗理諦」之中，作生存而已！ 是以改造品質附加價值所提昇，正是高等價值之經濟作用，當今世代有情眾生皆喜歡追求高經濟、高品質、高華麗的條件，是以當今世界人種所欲求，對文明世界若同落後世界國度，相互比較之時，又是如何？ 有情眾生皆會追求物質提昇，又對比較高經濟價值來肯定，在對當今時代的世界，不論任何國度皆是相同，也對一切生存取向中，能了知人類所追求高等價值作抉擇，必會在未來世界，更甚是如此的！ 十餘年前仙佛有交待：必要通過「外表及內在」設計包裝，給予高經濟價值作認定，人類對原本所具足條件，通過內外包裝，甚且能有莊嚴來呈現在眾生面前；又對整體聖務正是如此，必要通過內容客觀的公正性。 此冊《大道有情》天書，感謝 上蒼慈悲德澤，下化了人世間甚稀少的資糧，對於所有良善好德性之成就，提供人類明白往昔及當今「公律」所不同，針對未來科技文明的增長，是不可多得，能減少惡殃的了知。 人世間對因果報應所償受過程，正是絲毫不漏，在對人類世界或幽冥世界，就由個人因果業障，應該自己擔負與受報，才能符合天地所制定天律公理，尤其，對有情眾生能了知個人所作為，皆受因果償受報應過程。 有情一切善德者，可在自己造福過程，提昇自己德性與智慧，又以輕盈身軀化除一切因果償受完消，就在上昇超越所形成主導回歸，必要讓自己有豐富資糧作依憑，也要能有堅志毅力，方可達到的！ 理心光明禪師 題於 《大道有情》天書再版前 #大道有情 推薦序 人類世界若是待太久了，就會一次次輪迴，又一世世加深苦磨，很難具足福分享受，也就一直償受自己所造就 的業障，形成「福緣與惡緣果報」所分差，又讓自己難以上昇超越，長久一直處在人類世界與幽冥世界中。 絲毫不漏：人類給予上昇與下墜分界點，在人類生存潤生，若無法提昇超越至天界，反而會有諸多有情眾生一再沉淪幽冥世界，經常無法能具足善德因緣，皆在自己進入宗教之後，能否用心改變不良之習氣。 隔空撥轉：此種因緣是 上蒼眾仙佛近幾百年，重新更迭修整，提供有情眾生在「因果業障」的化除，對自己往昔因果償受與清除作用，在每個環節所產生，把自己入於真正改造動作，正是一世人減少很大障礙。 人類世界正是反覆輪迴幽冥世界，形成相互依循動作而已，是由出生至老死而謂之一生，能做人已經算是很不容易了，不是想要來人世間就可以來，必要有大因緣，而且再等待時機來到，才有機緣重新出生為人。 有者必須等待千百年，有之等待數百年，有之等待數十年，很少即刻過亡，能夠即刻出生者，此種條件是為不可能的事情，又在因緣果報之中，必要先回幽冥世界報到之後，再觀每一位眾生「因緣果報」而決定。 有情人種及幽冥亡靈等皆是如此，在對此種時局與環境，如何突破對「心性及靈性」作提昇，方能有大契機在未來老死與「提昇超越」作評定，才有再次為人的機會，必要通過「生命改造界」方能有償還動作。 大寰世界的人種來觀，都必要回幽冥世界報到，完消人類世界所有「因果顯現」之作用，把人世間一切因緣果報作未來評判的裁定，讓有情眾生等待到下一世人，何時可以再出生為人之契機？正是不一定的！ 天律絲毫不漏於因果循環的，是對大寰天地一切有情眾生，應該了知給予自己作報償動作，人類世界與幽冥世界正是兩個極端之世界，也一直作相互循環動作，必要由自己所作的「功德」提昇，以及「業障」作清償。 輪迴本質：必要讓自己可以作提昇，又讓自己往昔所作所為之因果循環，可以完消化除，若是以輪迴來觀，就是相當可取的主要因緣本，對一次輪迴、又再輪迴、三次輪迴，次次回回輪迴等，人類眾生又能奈何？ 感應本體：讓自己有磁性相吸作用，不會有磁性相斥作用，正是符合大寰天地，對所有因緣果報償受過程，也是由大寰天地「隔空感應」的，不是只在：一世、二世、三世、四世……，每世皆有磁性相吸之作用。 磁性相吸所主導，正是在大寰天地所感應，又對累世所種植善惡因緣，就會有確實報償的依據，又對上昇超越者來撥轉，就能化消累世不足作因果之償還，但是在人類眾生也就無法能有「撥轉功能」來償還。 磁性相吸作用，針對每一個環節，不論生存在任何國度世界，或是「隔空撥轉」的，每一個時間與空間，皆會存在磁性相吸導引下，也不會背離每一個「因果償還」的動作，這正是大寰天地公正所作為。 上昇超越者可以選擇，能否以功果及福報來撥轉，或是沿用其他方式作成全，有者必要親身下凡，償受先前所種植因果循環的報償，如果是以上昇超越者，也都必要如此清償，才能符合天地公正平等之圓滿。 感應：在每一個環節皆受磁性相吸動作，若是因果報應不成立之時，必無法「隔空感應」的，但是在每一個環節，皆不會背離因果相吸與相斥作用，可由磁性相吸來觀因果循環，所成就與承受者，即可一目了然。 天地絕對不會離開「天心鏡」所顯示，也離不開冥府「地心鏡」所彰顯，以及人類「ＩＣ微晶體」也就是「人心鏡」所感應，在每一個過程皆受到「天心鏡、地心鏡、人心鏡」所記錄，相吸與相斥因果顯現來報償。 理心光明禪師 題於 大道系列第十二冊再版前

title: The Israel Omen
author: David Brennan
Carrie Bebris
Gunnar Myrdal
description: The winds of a great storm build to a crescendo of power as its might approaches the coast of the United States. It will drive hundreds of thousands from their homes, many never to return. An earthquake of historical destructive power suddenly strikes from an unknown fault line in California, leaving in its wake the second most costly natural disaster in U.S. history. A flood, the like of which has not been seen for 500 years, ravages the Midwest United States, ruining crops and towns. Bizarre weather afflicts multitudes of people with hundreds of tornados striking in what is described as the "worst weather in U.S. history," immediately followed by a European heat wave described as the worst in the last 250 years. Terrorists successfully strike in another "day of infamy," and the entire financial structure of the world is shaken to its core as once mighty institutions begin to crumble. All of these terrible events would appear on the surface to be random acts of God. But, were they?        The Israel Omen considers a series of historically destructive events since 1991, connected by a common thread: warnings found in ancient Hebrew writings. Are these events perhaps the telling signs of an ancient omen, the same omen ignored by Egypt some 3500 years ago resulting in the famous Biblical plagues? Did this omen return with the homecoming of the Jews to the Holy Land in 1948?      As the nations of the world gather to remove the restored "Promised Land" from the Jews, the international group called the "Quartet" leading the effort eerily appears to be specifically mentioned in these ancient writings. Was the financial collapse that began in 2007 the beginning of a promised curse against the nations gathered to remove the restored "Promised Land?"

author: Kevin J. Conner

Дейл Брекенридж Карнеги & Наполеон Хилл

title: 大道一貫
author: 理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
description: #大道一貫 編輯誌 大道系列天書第十三冊《大道一貫》對人世間宗教信仰所認知，大部分都遺留過往的傳承，很難對自古以來，甚稀少真實理諦作參考，此種因緣根本都無法明白，千古真正的奧秘，也無法追尋更高超的天機良緣。 《大道一貫》這一冊天書，正是 上蒼對宇宙奧秘，幾千年來首次下化於人世間宗教當中，揭開「宇宙、天地」留傳所不同的觀念，提供在宗教良善增長，把過去在宗教所傳承，用另外一種真正意涵，詮釋道家之精要。 宇宙天地所演化，就由《大道一貫》所更迭，將道家的：無極、太極、兩儀修整更大變異，此種因緣對過去所認知，重新提供人世間由：無極、兩儀、太極的排列，這是在對於：無極、兩儀、太極之真實理諦。 整體地冥星系當中，是對萬靈蒼生有一種相當良善的增長，對於地冥星系所居住的，人類世界眾生與陰冥世界眾生之生長，只是不同空間的生長，正是變化兩者所有生存而已，更是對此種條件的提昇超越。 大道系列天書第十三冊《大道一貫》的目錄，天地演繹要先把：大道元始、一貫大道、大道一貫、乾坤始奠、陰陽兩儀、純一契轉、契轉轉契、化轉轉化、轉契作用，是對天地所有的下化當中，提供不同受益。 在此之後由日常生存傳承：體用一如、三際二邊、遷流三際、連貫四方、大寰五象、彌倫六合、天樞七星、天地八政、天地九如、福德十全、歸復傳繼、歸復回返、傳承繼續，由一至十所成就更良善的下化。 人類眾生所有的傳繼，就由生存的每一個動作，把日常生活，條綱十一、原則十二、理諦十三、作用十四、真實十五、道德十六、倫理十七、孝道親情十八、情理法治十九、公道人心二十，造就綿延不盡的傳承。 人世間所有良善提昇必要有：道源一貫、先天大道、一貫省思、改造回歸，組合了一本殊勝的天書，重新改寫道家所有認知，因為「無極」之後是「兩儀」再「太極」的排列，正是把「無極、兩儀、太極」作修整。 一貫主體是將人世間所認識，對千古以來的問題，示現當今時代作另一個角度正確的傳承，不分別人類能否接納此種認知，只是提供其他另一種思維，是對千古認知給予嶄新的作為，對真正想要超越者作回歸。 道家根基，是對元始初生本位降生凡塵，必能作自己修持改造因緣本，能以自己修為作成長，也因元始本位，正是自己因質成就之契機，大寰天地芸芸蒼生皆會存在成就因質，必要以自己提昇主要資源，方可達成。 大道本自然：由天地、無極、虛空、宇宙促成大道之原始作基礎，是對任何宗教皆可以相互融合，又對修持者正是改造因緣體，也不只在人類世界來生存而已，甚且可在其他星球世界國度，來成就自己之因質。 大道自然運轉，人類正是一個小周天，在天地、星系是一個中周天，若是同無極、虛空、大宇宙更是一個大周天，皆能相互來提昇成全，也在靈訊接收過程，同天地、無極、虛空、宇宙相互串連，可讓自己透視其境界。 要通過 上蒼「天心鏡」作自己吸納因本，就是以接收訊息能瞭解天界，可以同自己頻率來相互接合因緣，就會同自己頻率是完全一樣的！形成很順利來接收與吸納，同時也會排除與不接收之分別性。 一貫是對大道有相當作用，若要瞭解一貫對天地演繹過程，皆不會相互背離的，若不足或不圓滿又如何能有行使頻率？就要有真正相互融合之契機，又對頻率就有接收過程，能否滲入干擾與繁雜頻率來接收？不一定！ 大道一貫本質，對頻率接收者兩相有吸納動作，又對頻率有相同之時，是在人類世界有良善提昇，此種因緣對所有成長是明白了，由「先天降中天再降後天」的順序，會形成未來在「一貫」所促成的回歸超越。 理心光明禪師 題於 《大道一貫》天書再版前 #大道一貫 推薦序 元始初生本位降生於凡塵，必能作自己修持改造的因緣本，能以自己修為作成長，也因元始本位，正是自己因質成就之契機，大寰天地芸芸蒼生皆會存在成就因質，必要以自己提昇主要資源，方可達成。 一貫是對大道有相當作用，若要瞭解一貫對天地演繹的過程，皆不會相互背離，若是不足或不圓滿又如何能有行使頻率？就要有真正相互融合契機，又對頻率就會有接收過程，有否滲入干擾與繁雜頻率來接收？ 先天大道作成就提昇，在對有情眾生的「普渡收圓」當中，來提昇自己往上成就之因緣本，是以「一貫先天大道」作主理，提供有情眾生來成長，就可由「興向了別」之作用，給予自己能邁向更大寬廣成長空間。 彌勒淨土：是以「唯識理論、唯識觀念、唯識行徑」作總合體，若欲等待歿度之後，再進入彌勒內院參學唯識基礎，即有些太慢了，當下就由 無極皇母親身懿命，把未來欲進入彌勒淨土內院，作修持課程已提前於當下。 就由人類世界來學習與成長，因為已經在人類世界來建構了，必能明白「唯識理論、觀念、行徑」的，更在往後欲進入彌勒內院，作學習「唯識理論、觀念、行徑」修持課程，也在當下已有很深刻通徹與了知。 而不必未來再入於 彌勒淨土作修整，若是因緣與弘化願力，欲入 彌勒淨土作修整，其實早已具備，在對彌勒淨土教化師資之資糧（格）位階，不用等到歿度之後，很辛苦的再進入於 彌勒淨土來學習與成長！ 是由個人所作所為來達至，對往後所有災劫來化除，因為「延康風劫」罡風劫難已漸形成了，然而，以「延康風劫災殃……」在人類世界中，若無法有當下更大超越與回歸，會讓自己永遠處在人類世界的輪迴。 更會障礙自己回歸與成長，又如何檢討改進？就是以一貫先天大道所有修子，能及早把未來要很辛苦努力，欲入於 彌勒淨土來修習過程，必可以先在於當下人世間，很輕鬆給予自己有思惟建構之通徹。 給予未來，不論入於任何宗教派脈間修持，或在人世間每一個：三十六弓長、七十二袓師皆是各化一方，而此不能謂之真假天命，也不論各人層次高下，又以 上蒼來觀：正是各下化一方，導引所有任務。 若言，只有「天下唯一」天命才能回歸，那請問：又為何要萬教齊發，能謂之假天命否？不也！正是在「萬教齊發」同時，必然要有「萬教歸一」所集結，而此歸一即是「天地正理」來施行，方是正確！ 絕不是只在自己天命多大或是天下唯一，又是多麼殊勝，必要明晰：對天命正是天之賦予，所成就與擔當職責使命，各個宗脈皆有之；可謂之我所信仰宗教，才會有大天命，其他宗教無小天命否？試思即可明白！ 天之大命所賦予，真正能帶領有情眾生來回歸，如此在於「普渡收圓」當下，給予對天道修子，了知：三十六假弓長、七十二假袓師當中，就不應該分別於真假，也不應該分別於天命，更是不應分別人數多寡。 就以各人承領一方天命作下化，如實對萬教齊發，又在萬教歸一，歸於何處之「一」否？乃是「純一」的！此種「純一」就是以「萬教歸一」總合體，若言萬教歸一，更不是只歸於某一宗教，或只歸於某一人而已！ 此種就已非宗教平等所應該有的作法，是皆歸於無極一貫先天，乃是回歸「純一」作主理，絕對不會只歸附人間的「一貫先天大道」而已！此為謬論，因為萬教歸一之「一」者，正是元始真如自真本性，才是如實！ 萬教要歸於一統，並非以人道世界來歸納，又未來再等待 彌勒下生，請問當下真實修行之修子，應該如何自處？是否讓其流浪生死於三途六道之中？不也！又因 彌勒真正下生之時，正是時空尚未來到人間的！ 理心光明禪師 題於 大道系列第十三冊再版前

author: Nikky-Guninder Kaur Singh
Professor John Muncie

description: Describes the basic tenets of Sikhism, tells the story of its growth in India, examines the recent move toward greater political independence within the Indian nation, the effects of Hindu nationalism on the Sikh community, and issues of cultural adaptation, persecution, and and subsequent education now taking place in the West.   Content: Introduction: Sikhism and the modern world -- Guru Nanak and the origins of the Sikh faith -- Sikh tradition and the Guru Granth -- Sikh thought -- Sikh ethics -- Religious life and rites of passage -- Sacred space and altered time -- Women and Sikhism -- Siky tradition and modern culture. Abstract:                           One of the world's youngest religions, Sikhism was founded about 500 years ago in northern India. This book describes the basic tenets of Sikhism, tells the engaging story of its growth in India, examines the move toward greater political independence within the Indian nation, and the effects of Hindu nationalism on the Sikh community. Read more...

title: 文化神话学
author: 鲁刚著
Ariel Salleh
John August
description: 《文化神话学》讲述了：神话尽管其形态各异，但它的内显形式就是意识形态。“意识在任何时候都只能是被意识到了的存在，而人们的存在就是他们的实际生活过程。”（马克思语）这段话是极其深刻的，对神话研究具有极强的指导意义。研究神话必须研究产生神话的时代和产生神话的社会条件。社会是发展的，神话也会随着社会的发展而发生变化。在后期的神话中有许多时间和空间的积淀物。神话虽然“年代久远”，“幼稚可笑”，但它与现代科学所要求的目标是十分近似的。

description: Discover the adventures that happen in the town of Odyssey with this 4-in-1 book! Featuring the stories, Lights Out At Camp What-a-Nut, The King's Quest, Danger Lies Ahead and A Carnival of Secrets. Way back when . . . before Connie arrived in Odyssey or Eugene ever picked up a ukulele, there were fun-loving youngsters in town like Mark Prescott and Patti Eldridge. But like many kids, their curiosity often takes them places that spell trouble. Mark lands in a battle in another time and place, Patti visits an off-limits fortune-teller - plus an escaped convict is headed straight for Odyssey! Behind the dangers are important lessons that will change the lives of the kids in Odyssey - and maybe yours, too!

title: The Day I Was Crucified: As Told by Jesus Christ
author: Gene Edwards
Anne Lambright
Elisabeth Guerrero
Susan Lipkins
description: The most powerful depiction of the death of Christ ever written. See that infamous day not through the eyes, nor the voice of other men, but rather through the eyes and voice of the Lord Jesus Christ himself. He tells you of that day.    There has never been a more stunning, more heart-touching piece of Christian literature to be found in the English language as is The Day I Was Crucified.    Because it is His account of His own death, you will discover little known aspects of Christ’s death. You are also ushered into a presentation of the Lord’s death as seen from the viewpoint of principalities and powers as they gather on Golgatha. You will meet the embodiment of the law, of sin, and the world system…even the personification of Death as he arrives on the scene to claim his victim.    The Day I Was Crucified stands out as literary excellence apart from virtually any books known in the modern era.

description: This breathtakingly beautiful book will be read by  children for years to come. The stories are simply and gently told but  retain all the poetry and power of the Bible. They have been carefully  chosen for the images they evoke, the symbols they represent, and the  mystery they contain. The illustrations, by world-famous artist Ulises  Wensel, capture scenes from the Bible with wonder, humor, and  affection. This is the most strikingly visual and readable childrens  Bible ever produced.    Includes glossary of names, places, and difficult Bible terms.    Stories from the Old Testament:    * Adam and Eve in the Garden of Eden    * The Story of Noah    * The Story of Moses    * Young David and Goliath the Giant    * Great King Solomon      Stories from the New Testament:    * A Cradle in a Manger    * Jesus in the Temple    * The First Disciples    * Five Loaves and Two Fishes    * The Last Supper    Dimensions (inches): 8 1/2 x 11

title: 大道無極
author: 理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
description: #大道虛空 編輯誌 大道系列天書第十四冊《大道虛空》宇宙浩瀚無窮無盡，在對大寰天地中所有星系，正是要有調整定位功能之平衡作用，不僅在地球星系而已，含包一切宇宙星系眾星球體間，皆是如此相互平衡，是相互之護佑動作。 「虛空」天界－正是古往所沿用名詞，也在於當下皆是以「宇宙」之名詞，讓有情眾生可以明晰，是在銀河星系作演化德澤於眾星球間，這種就有宇宙天際眾星球體，相互平衡於大道軌跡。 不論在對：日、月、金、木、水、火、土、地球、海王、天王……，所有星際平衡，必須遵循於此旋轉定律，作各個行使條件與作用，達至各體星球平衡與融合，就有良善的運行「自轉與公轉」軌道。 若以當今時代所有有情眾生來言，對大寰星際作相互融合，必要了知人類所生存之地球空間，就是以南贍部洲作依持，對地球星際有情眾生，可由各自修為來達至，讓各己『心性之提昇』與『靈性之超越』。 對各己潤生方式，皆以各人所作所為來達至，對心性靈性兩者，作「明心見性、開悟證果」又是很如宜；又為何要達至「明心見性、開悟證果」？是要經由人世間宗教來達成「心、身、靈」三者來提昇！ 在對虛空或無極天界，所散發頻率作接納與排斥，又在於所有因緣綜合體，可以由各人所接收、吸納、排斥作用，讓各人靈力所接收過程，把各己因緣作統合，提供往上增長原動力，而成為超越之根本。 為何當今時代有情眾生：靈乩、通靈者，也會在此種時際就有接靈動作，是對靈訊作用，來了別是何種條件！若以無極作下化，在對大寰天際所有星系，作各星球體之間提昇，以及平衡所運行。 正是由虛空來主導，對於各星際平衡與眷顧，就是虛空同無極來促成在此元會，所有融合公轉與自轉主導，就會對所有銀河星系作相互成全、相互保護動作，更是相互把大道至正公平條綱，同任何之星系作提昇。 銀河星系，所有融合於南贍部洲之地區來言，正是由各個星系體當中，作個體提昇因緣本，又對星系作相互來成長，在地球星系以人類生存為依歸，也以日月照耀著大寰所有星球天地。 是作相互輝映於無窮無盡的，針對南贍部洲下化於人類世界，或由其他星球世界，可對虛空因緣種子來提昇、成全，勿使沉淪於其星際，若是難以回歸於原始根源，必要由虛空天界，借調諸多仙佛下化於該星際。 給予虛空根源之種子，不會埋沒於該星系所沉淪，反而給予時常提醒，勿使永沉輪迴當中，必要了知對虛空根源下化之種子，皆是 上蒼所疼愛有情眾仙佛，是作相互成全與導引，也在任何環境來達至提昇。 就可以彰顯原始根源本因質，況且，把沉淪下降者，再作往上來提昇，必要有靜濾、淨化作用，更可以回歸自己靈性輕盈且清明，又讓污穢可以化消，也讓業障可以化除，是對自己所有生存，就有良善成長提昇。 如此因緣，是由虛空來達至，下化拯救於虛空根源之種子，對所下化者皆一體平等，甚且公平如是的照顧，因為要成就於虛空因緣者，乃是稀少，更是少之又少！故而在原始根源，皆有真正來相互融合。 若是以台疆來觀，此其中又以崇心大因緣，更是超越其他宗教因緣，而下降台疆或凡塵之因緣者，此種因緣同無極，就有一個相輔相成契機，就是由主事者來依歸，而且同往昔所有凝聚情感作用，相互來成全。 正因為有這種高優質DNA，在對有情眾生不論在任何星球當中，皆是一個提昇原動力，又是給予能有豐富資源作下化，對因質提昇正是由大道所演繹，促成宇宙進化論過程，來追溯於任何星系之成長。 理心光明禪師 題於 戊戌年春節 桃園佛堂 #大道虛空 推薦序 整體是相互來提攜、相互眷顧，讓此種因緣作根基，又為何在於當下，有諸多虛空天界下化南贍部洲因緣？就是有原由的；所以，在虛空根源－又是肇基初始，如此必要厚愛台疆有情教化者，尤其是對崇心宗脈之因緣。 必要讓此種因緣，所有著作「大道系列天書」之主體聖務，絕不是一般寺廟宮堂可以達至此資糧位，在台疆所有寺廟宮堂中，為何不遴選其他宗脈作此聖務？又為何欲在崇心來行使此種聖務？ 有情眾生對福祉追求是無止盡的，又 上蒼給予有情眾生良善因緣，不論任何星系萬物蒼生，皆是一體平等、一體博愛、一體公正，來眷顧護佑銀河星系所有星球作融合，就是由整體提昇，能有高優質DNA作成長。 正是很如實，是對這種成長，可以提供該星系科技進化，給予所有宇宙星系，文明科技向前邁進與不斷創造，而今，已歷經超過百億萬年時光中，在對地球星系科技文明，所分差不同功能作用。 若又以地球星系來提昇，正是歷經64億時光年所存在於該星系，作成長因緣本與契機體，就因為有科技創造所達至！針對每一顆星系有情眾生來言，在科技微晶體早已經由「創造與進化」，對兩者作提昇。 給予是高等優質DNA作成長，又在大宇宙所有演繹過程，該如何在原本是無明荒蕪，經由創造來達至進化？也因為這種高等科技文明所展現的，是對每一顆星系科技作下化，來提昇人類眾生之福祉。 又以當下地球星系來觀：若欲超越其他星系科技文明所彰顯，在目前來觀是不能達至，而且，曾經就有這種高等優質科技文明之過程，又在當下的有情眾生，為何可以在高山中，見至深海地底之貝殼？ 就有一個地殼再造變動過程，這些早已經曾經存在過了，又把過往已曾經存在地殼變動基本作用來了知，為何這種科技文明，況且曾經已有存在過，又為何至今卻是不復見？實則可觀整體科技所印證。 就因為歷經了每一個元會，各將近有20億萬餘年左右之時光，也因科技文明所作用，又有情眾生頭腦思惟，就是相當靈敏之聰智，尤其在對高等優質科技文明所展現，宛如人類世界宗教言，極樂世界或是天國世界。 為何當下有情眾生，而無法能把此身軀，直接邁入其他星系作融合？是對此身軀沈重當中，又無法能引「軀體作契入」，正因為人類世界，若可經由高等優質科技提昇，而不用食一切萬物蒼生作溫飽，又會如何？ 這種高等優質軀體即可存活，又是如何達至對各種身軀可融合大虛空、大無極、大天地演化與進化所創造而達成，又進化基本架構，不論任何星系，皆是可以提昇原動力，也對每一顆星系所創造與進化提昇。 正是同無極、虛空、大宇宙，來爭個真正千秋萬代所乘越，此種人類當下作為，就有相當大關連性，未來成就因緣與資糧位依據，能提昇成長原動力，正是由當下來乘越於往上提昇必要性。 這種時空過程，又是當下人類世界，所無法能了知與明晰，為何要把這種科技文明，就要透過於著作「大道系列天書」中來了知，這是人世間甚稀少有之殊勝剖析，在對地球星系進化作提昇與超越。 不僅地球星系而已，尚且拓及銀河星系及外銀河星系……，所有萬物眾生在人類世界這個空間中，又只有一至六度空間來存在，但無法能突破於七至十度空間以上之因質，也甚少突破其他星球十四度空間以上。 就因為這種摺疊時間與空間，正是人類經典所言：不同境界與不同國度；若可由人類世界經典作通徹，必會把經典在當下及未來中，能有一個相互比擬、相互輝映之時間與空間，提供人類眾生智慧成長。 理心光明禪師 題於 戊戌年春節桃園佛堂

title: 大道自性
author: 理心光明禪師
Bambang Budi Utomo (editor)
理心光明禪師 [理心光明禪師]
description: 大道自性 編輯誌 正是萬靈蒼生來具備一種叫做靈性，也叫做是自性，這種「靈光體」所具備，就會有「能量體」所具備，可以觀不同能量體所具足，又是在何種的條件來謂之「靈光體」的具足，以及「能量體」的差別性。 人世間來區分，由第三空間到第十空間，這其中的不同體所在，該如何達到各種層次、境界、果位的分差性，也形成在此當中就以一般的第三空間作基礎，是以無形界為其根基，必要明白人世間只是在第四空間來生存。 又何種原因來出生在於其家庭中？就有關前世「因緣果報」的相互循環，才有機會可以投生於其家中，不然，人類眾生都想要投生比較富裕的家庭，如果沒有同其前世福報與因緣，相信想要投生富貴人家，也就不可能的！ 每一個人的靈性，都想要讓自己有更好的生存空間，就觀自己的前世「因緣」又是如何？若是投生其家中，就會產生「果報」的結合，是對「靈性更迭」每次輪迴之後，甚少能如自己所意願，來選擇投生於其家中。 這其中就會起現對「靈、魄」這兩者的相交，才會起現對目標的達成，在對目標的起現是一種欲求，也由欲求該如何進行對目標的達成，正是自己嚮往及對自己所需要，來區別人世間就有相互的成全。 此種因緣，在人世間不分別人種與物種皆是一樣，也在此種的欲求，就是人類創造與創進的原動力！這是人世間皆不會了知的問題點，一般人對欲求，只是一種需要與嚮往而已，在自己所欲求與嚮往就很難明白。 而有相互對目標的依持，將這些納入軀體的欲念，區分可得與不可得的分差，這時候對欲求正是一種念頭的興起之後，再加上要有執持力量的創進與促成，形成能否得到的區別性，也達到「靈性種因」的相互依持。 魄體是由七魄當中的欲求，就以七魄來區分對所有需要性，正是有一個念頭的興起之後，再加上執持力量的行使，促成對目標來達成與否的分界點，其實只要不是太困難的目標，一般人都會很容易來達到。 宇宙光音的能量體，就是以佛家所言：人類眾生是來自於「光音天界」的下化於凡塵世界，此種光音就有了三天：一者少光天、二者無量光天、三者光音天的下化，在對佛經所言「光音天」又是如何？ 也就是以道家所言，由無極下降於天明星（光音天）的能量體，來行使人世間所有行為準則的依持，又這種光音天的能量，就是一種天明星能量體，此種區分佛家與道家所言之名相，其實都是相同一個地區來下化而已。 形成人世間所言：「自性起現」與「靈性作意」，這兩者都是相同物質所具備，但以不同宗教所言名稱，就有不同的狀況，來依持人世間在所有的不同能量體，這種對人世間甚少明白其作意又是如何？ 人類進入宗教信仰，就有各種宗教派脈來主導不同的行事作為，此種條件在人類有何種的行為動作， 上蒼就會引動何種星系體能量加入其中，起現不同能量的加添，區分為一種「日辰能量與月辰能量」的差別性。 如何對自己在「星辰光音能量體」所具足的條件？必要了知每一個人類眾生，就有不同的「星辰光音能量」下化於不同物種的加添！也針對人類眾生與萬物蒼生，必有很多不同行為動作的能量體來施行。 每一個人類與萬物，就有不同的星系體能量，來加入於軀體當中，就會起現何種能量的行為動作，所以，在三綱、五常、四維、八德當中，起現各種良善能量體的加添，也在所作所為當中，若有不良行為的動作又會如何？ 就會具足軀體當中來儲藏，是在於IC微晶體及毘羅性海當中，也就不會抹滅此種記憶體的儲存，所以，人類眾生也在行為動作，就會影響IC微晶體所儲存的功能性，而不會抹滅所作所為的一切行動體，加入軀體的功能。 人之作為來造就所有生存取向，正是一種相互加添的作用；人類眾生分別由行為動作來植入軀體的能量，也形成天地當中針對人類的所作所為，而依持對自己的行動體，來加添不同的行為動作。 針對：三綱、五常、四維、八德的道德規制以及行為動作，此種人世間是以人之作用，就有一種行動體，也經由天地能量體串連對人為造就的依持性，該如何了知，又為什麼同宇宙星系，會串連對人類軀體是何種能量？ 正是一種更先進文明的創造，能利益未來眾生的福祉於長遠無窮盡，這是人類眾生所無法明白的思想觀念，為何會有摺疊空間的文明進化？又為何可以穿越時空的過程而直接達到，就由即刻當中能抵達目的地？ 此種的文明進化，相信對現在人類科技，就無法有這種的思想概論，必會在未來中才會實證，是對 上蒼高等層次仙佛的能量體，為何可以直接將空間來摺疊？又為何可以穿透時空所存在的剎那，是即刻之間可以來抵達？ 若以當今的思想觀念，必要明白為何有摺疊的空間？又為何可以穿透不同次元的時空？此種若以人類的文明進化，想要了知必要借重於「借將」文明來提示，才有摺疊空間所應用剎那間來抵達，也對不同時空所移化。 理心光明禪師 題於大道自性出版前2013年春節 大道自性 推薦序 科技文明所展現，是相當先進的智慧，同時也對認知觀念的再進化，此種因緣對人類的科技，可以言是相當先進，就必要有此種的條件，方可將宇宙遙遠的星球體，經過摺疊空間就有「一次元至三十次元」的存在空間。 人類思想要進化，為何有摺疊空間的必要性？因為整體宇宙正是太遙遠也太廣泛，若以直射空間的速度，根本都不是用人類生命可以達到的契機，又為何對所有上昇超越這些高能量者，一下子即可穿透摺疊的必要性？ 對直射空間正是一種相當大存在體，此種高能量者，就可應用到摺疊空間所存在，正是頃刻之間即來到目的地，也在相當小的範圍之內，穿透所有欲求的目的，又對比較高能量的存在者，就可以達到的條件。 此種時空的因緣，若以人世間的眼光與思想，也就不能達成，必要體悟不同次元的存在，對不同次元所存在的空間，也就不是一般人類可了知的觀念，此種的條件，若以人世間，根本甚難穿透於不同次元的存在。 在對現今人類世界，想要超越不同次元，根本都不可能的！又一般人類也只是在「相同次元、相同次方」的存在而已，所以，想要超越「不同次元與不同次方」，必要借用摺疊空間所存在的能量體。 也對此種時空因緣，必要借用快速航空器具，就不是以人類科學里程，來計算所有可以抵達的空間，如果以「相同次元、相同次方」也比較容易進行，雖然時空因緣也比較長遠些，但依人類科技文明必要有長久壽命的存在。 如何改造人類的基因本質，才可以直接來抵達？如果是以人類生命做基因改造，必要如實提昇RNA的條件，此種可由現今人世間的基因DNA，進化更優良的RNA基因，做未來可以抵達的時空壽命。 宇宙科技的文明，對人世間就有相當大的進化成長，在當今世代，正是「借將」了外星系二百餘萬位高科技人才，下化人世間作改造人類的基因本質，是以過去時空因緣尚不成熟，就必要有一段時空因緣的成長。 而今世代：已有良善進化的提昇，對有情的人類眾生，加以改變過去無明障礙的成長提昇；又此種在當今科技文明已經進化為更超前的契機，尤其針對現今世代，在整體地冥星空間，可謂之相當的文明進化。 在對一切科技的作用，只是局限在此地冥星而已，想要窺視整體宇宙的星系，就必要有一段長時間的摸索之後，方可達到此種條件來往上增長，對人世間在「宇宙星系時代」來臨之前，必要將地冥星的一切先作了知。 若不能由人類的基因本質來進化，想要有如實對科技文明的提昇，就會有一大段長遠時空的學習摸索，這是千真萬確的大時代因緣！此種條件對整體宇宙星系的演繹，先由人類所居住的地冥星，來加以修整改變。 是對當今世代，必要明白人類的科技文明，就有一種對軀體進化，同時也有靈體的提昇增長，相對的，在人世間若不能將人類眾生的軀體，進化更長遠生命的存在界，又宛如當今時空也只有百年歲月的生命而已。 人類眾生想要有更大的進化，絕不是當下可以了知與真正明晰的體證，是以當下必要如實來進化「DNA」的提昇，把人世間來超越「RNA」的優良基因，就可以改變過去只局限百年時空生命的障礙。 這種區域的能量體，又具足何種五行變異能量的色澤？含括五行當中的：仁、義、禮、智、信；金、木、水、火、土；青、黃、紅、白、黑，這些五行來區分對不同色澤，就有不同的能量。（以下五行排列表） 東方、甲乙、木：仁、青、肝、肝膽、殺、元性、遊魂 西方、庚辛、金：義、白、肺、呼吸、盜、元情、鬼魄 南方、丙丁、火：禮、紅、心、循環、淫、元神、識神 北方、壬癸、水：智、黑、腎、泌尿、酒、元精、濁精 中央、戊己、土：信、黃、脾、淋巴、妄、元氣、妄意 人世間的生存，就有真正想往上提昇修持超越者，大部分人根本都不可能有知識的增長，也在宗教所教導的觀念，一直認為過去宗教仙佛所教導的觀念，才是相當正確。 軀體能量：又是一種更超越的成長，這樣大家可以明白，為何仙佛老師過去不曾言之，但卻可以由汝等所作所為來了知，此種條件所具足，正是相當龐大光音能量體，直接加添在大家的「自性（靈性）與軀體」當中。 此種條件所造就人類的不同所作所為，皆會串連整體宇宙星系不同能量體的加添與減少；又為何要如此？是對人類倫常：孝、悌、忠、信、禮、義、廉、恥、智、仁、勇、和合，以及綱常倫理、道德規制來施行。 就是在人類眾生日常生活當中，所具備施行的條綱與準則，此種能量體，又為何會具足在每一位眾生的軀體之內？也形成人類的所作所為，正是有個「宇宙光音」能量的「吸附體」，也造就人類不同能量的具足。 又在這種的「吸附體」，對每一位眾生不分別只是人類眾生而已，甚且拓及萬物眾生，只要在人世間有何種的行為動作，會變成所加添在不同萬物的軀體當中，就有何種能量來植入軀體所具備的條件。 理心光明禪師 題於大道自性出版前2013年春節

title: الإيمان الحر أو ما بعد الملة
author: فتحي المسكيني
The Open University
Florencia Servera

title: 大道虛空
author: 理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師
description: #大道虛空 編輯誌 大道系列天書第十四冊《大道虛空》宇宙浩瀚無窮無盡，在對大寰天地中所有星系，正是要有調整定位功能之平衡作用，不僅在地球星系而已，含包一切宇宙星系眾星球體間，皆是如此相互平衡，是相互之護佑動作。 「虛空」天界－正是古往所沿用名詞，也在於當下皆是以「宇宙」之名詞，讓有情眾生可以明晰，是在銀河星系作演化德澤於眾星球間，這種就有宇宙天際眾星球體，相互平衡於大道軌跡。 不論在對：日、月、金、木、水、火、土、地球、海王、天王……，所有星際平衡，必須遵循於此旋轉定律，作各個行使條件與作用，達至各體星球平衡與融合，就有良善的運行「自轉與公轉」軌道。 若以當今時代所有有情眾生來言，對大寰星際作相互融合，必要了知人類所生存之地球空間，就是以南贍部洲作依持，對地球星際有情眾生，可由各自修為來達至，讓各己『心性之提昇』與『靈性之超越』。 對各己潤生方式，皆以各人所作所為來達至，對心性靈性兩者，作「明心見性、開悟證果」又是很如宜；又為何要達至「明心見性、開悟證果」？是要經由人世間宗教來達成「心、身、靈」三者來提昇！ 在對虛空或無極天界，所散發頻率作接納與排斥，又在於所有因緣綜合體，可以由各人所接收、吸納、排斥作用，讓各人靈力所接收過程，把各己因緣作統合，提供往上增長原動力，而成為超越之根本。 為何當今時代有情眾生：靈乩、通靈者，也會在此種時際就有接靈動作，是對靈訊作用，來了別是何種條件！若以無極作下化，在對大寰天際所有星系，作各星球體之間提昇，以及平衡所運行。 正是由虛空來主導，對於各星際平衡與眷顧，就是虛空同無極來促成在此元會，所有融合公轉與自轉主導，就會對所有銀河星系作相互成全、相互保護動作，更是相互把大道至正公平條綱，同任何之星系作提昇。 銀河星系，所有融合於南贍部洲之地區來言，正是由各個星系體當中，作個體提昇因緣本，又對星系作相互來成長，在地球星系以人類生存為依歸，也以日月照耀著大寰所有星球天地。 是作相互輝映於無窮無盡的，針對南贍部洲下化於人類世界，或由其他星球世界，可對虛空因緣種子來提昇、成全，勿使沉淪於其星際，若是難以回歸於原始根源，必要由虛空天界，借調諸多仙佛下化於該星際。 給予虛空根源之種子，不會埋沒於該星系所沉淪，反而給予時常提醒，勿使永沉輪迴當中，必要了知對虛空根源下化之種子，皆是 上蒼所疼愛有情眾仙佛，是作相互成全與導引，也在任何環境來達至提昇。 就可以彰顯原始根源本因質，況且，把沉淪下降者，再作往上來提昇，必要有靜濾、淨化作用，更可以回歸自己靈性輕盈且清明，又讓污穢可以化消，也讓業障可以化除，是對自己所有生存，就有良善成長提昇。 如此因緣，是由虛空來達至，下化拯救於虛空根源之種子，對所下化者皆一體平等，甚且公平如是的照顧，因為要成就於虛空因緣者，乃是稀少，更是少之又少！故而在原始根源，皆有真正來相互融合。 若是以台疆來觀，此其中又以崇心大因緣，更是超越其他宗教因緣，而下降台疆或凡塵之因緣者，此種因緣同無極，就有一個相輔相成契機，就是由主事者來依歸，而且同往昔所有凝聚情感作用，相互來成全。 正因為有這種高優質DNA，在對有情眾生不論在任何星球當中，皆是一個提昇原動力，又是給予能有豐富資源作下化，對因質提昇正是由大道所演繹，促成宇宙進化論過程，來追溯於任何星系之成長。 理心光明禪師 題於 戊戌年春節 桃園佛堂 #大道虛空 推薦序 整體是相互來提攜、相互眷顧，讓此種因緣作根基，又為何在於當下，有諸多虛空天界下化南贍部洲因緣？就是有原由的；所以，在虛空根源－又是肇基初始，如此必要厚愛台疆有情教化者，尤其是對崇心宗脈之因緣。 必要讓此種因緣，所有著作「大道系列天書」之主體聖務，絕不是一般寺廟宮堂可以達至此資糧位，在台疆所有寺廟宮堂中，為何不遴選其他宗脈作此聖務？又為何欲在崇心來行使此種聖務？ 有情眾生對福祉追求是無止盡的，又 上蒼給予有情眾生良善因緣，不論任何星系萬物蒼生，皆是一體平等、一體博愛、一體公正，來眷顧護佑銀河星系所有星球作融合，就是由整體提昇，能有高優質DNA作成長。 正是很如實，是對這種成長，可以提供該星系科技進化，給予所有宇宙星系，文明科技向前邁進與不斷創造，而今，已歷經超過百億萬年時光中，在對地球星系科技文明，所分差不同功能作用。 若又以地球星系來提昇，正是歷經64億時光年所存在於該星系，作成長因緣本與契機體，就因為有科技創造所達至！針對每一顆星系有情眾生來言，在科技微晶體早已經由「創造與進化」，對兩者作提昇。 給予是高等優質DNA作成長，又在大宇宙所有演繹過程，該如何在原本是無明荒蕪，經由創造來達至進化？也因為這種高等科技文明所展現的，是對每一顆星系科技作下化，來提昇人類眾生之福祉。 又以當下地球星系來觀：若欲超越其他星系科技文明所彰顯，在目前來觀是不能達至，而且，曾經就有這種高等優質科技文明之過程，又在當下的有情眾生，為何可以在高山中，見至深海地底之貝殼？ 就有一個地殼再造變動過程，這些早已經曾經存在過了，又把過往已曾經存在地殼變動基本作用來了知，為何這種科技文明，況且曾經已有存在過，又為何至今卻是不復見？實則可觀整體科技所印證。 就因為歷經了每一個元會，各將近有20億萬餘年左右之時光，也因科技文明所作用，又有情眾生頭腦思惟，就是相當靈敏之聰智，尤其在對高等優質科技文明所展現，宛如人類世界宗教言，極樂世界或是天國世界。 為何當下有情眾生，而無法能把此身軀，直接邁入其他星系作融合？是對此身軀沈重當中，又無法能引「軀體作契入」，正因為人類世界，若可經由高等優質科技提昇，而不用食一切萬物蒼生作溫飽，又會如何？ 這種高等優質軀體即可存活，又是如何達至對各種身軀可融合大虛空、大無極、大天地演化與進化所創造而達成，又進化基本架構，不論任何星系，皆是可以提昇原動力，也對每一顆星系所創造與進化提昇。 正是同無極、虛空、大宇宙，來爭個真正千秋萬代所乘越，此種人類當下作為，就有相當大關連性，未來成就因緣與資糧位依據，能提昇成長原動力，正是由當下來乘越於往上提昇必要性。 這種時空過程，又是當下人類世界，所無法能了知與明晰，為何要把這種科技文明，就要透過於著作「大道系列天書」中來了知，這是人世間甚稀少有之殊勝剖析，在對地球星系進化作提昇與超越。 不僅地球星系而已，尚且拓及銀河星系及外銀河星系……，所有萬物眾生在人類世界這個空間中，又只有一至六度空間來存在，但無法能突破於七至十度空間以上之因質，也甚少突破其他星球十四度空間以上。 就因為這種摺疊時間與空間，正是人類經典所言：不同境界與不同國度；若可由人類世界經典作通徹，必會把經典在當下及未來中，能有一個相互比擬、相互輝映之時間與空間，提供人類眾生智慧成長。 理心光明禪師 題於 戊戌年春節桃園佛堂

title: Closed for the Season
author: Mary Downing Hahn
Philip S. Alexander
Armin Lange and Renate J. Pillinger (editors)
נויה שגיב
description: A contemporary thriller by the bestselling author of THE OLD WILLIS PLACE.Two 13-year-old boys, Arthur and Logan, set out to solve the mystery of a murder that took place some years ago in the old house Logan's family has just moved into. The boys' quest takes them to the highest and lowest levels of society in their small Maryland town, and eventually to a derelict amusement park that is supposedly closed for the season.

description:
GUARDIANS OF THE 
GALAXYThe onslaught of the Melconians was not the last conflict that 
humanity's interstellar Concordiat would have to face. For now the 
Kezdai -- a newly encountered species with war at the center of their 
philosophy -- have taken to arms against the Concordiat and its colony 
worlds. For war, the Terrans have only one answer:Break out the BolosSelf-aware
 robotic tanks, the Bolos have fought bravely and well since the days 
when humans fought each other. Now they battle across the stars to 
defend us all...and though the times are perilous, we've never been in 
better hands than those of our old metal guardians: Keith Laumer's 
greatest creation, the Bolos.Includes:Incursion by by Mark ThiesRook's gambit by by John MinaThe sky is falling by by J. Steven York & Dan Wesley SmithBrothers by by William H. Keith, Jr.

title: Diamantine
author: Andrew Rowe (Fantasy fiction writer)
Blake Pierce
Steve Berry
description: After bonding with Dawnbringer, the Sacred Sword of Light, Keras Selyrian travels to the nation of Edria to compete in the Tournament of the Sacred Sword. The winner of the tournament will be given a chance to fight for the Sacred Sword of Stone if they can defeat the current wielder, the impossibly powerful Emperor of Edria, in single combat. Winning the tournament will be no simple endeavor. To succeed, Keras will have to face representatives from every nation, other foreign travelers of great skill, his own allies, other sacred sword wielders...and even a familiar face from his past. But the tournament itself won’t be the only challenge. When tournament contestants are found dead, Keras discovers the telltale signs of a familiar type of enemy--one that even his own formidable powers might fail to match.

title: 大道因果
author: 理心光明禪師
理心光明禪師 [理心光明禪師]
理心光明禪師
description: 大道因果 編輯誌 大道系列天書第廿五冊《大道因果》，人道世界後，必會有男女乾坤婚配，作傳承後代子孫基本作用，經由兩位不同乾坤男女婚配之後，在雙方情義與情誼，形成夫妻恩愛感情，相互提昇作傳承後代子孫興旺。 及今已經改變這種行為動作與思想觀念，在歐美世界國度女權抬頭之後，中土炎黃子孫也對歐美國度模仿學習之，在這種女權抬頭引入於中土國度，對大寰天地當中乾坤男女，就有角度互換及平衡權利之開始。 也就對中土男女平權，就有很大沖激，又在中土往昔之媒介，作男女乾坤婚姻所匹配，經由媒妁之言，在雙方兩人原來根本都不認識，經過媒妁之言，在雙方父母同意下組織成為一個家庭，此時不似現今，也甚少見面的！ 如此未婚之前都不曾見過面，又對方是長得如何也不知道，想見一面心裡就會小鹿亂撞「不好意思」！又很難用正視眼光來看對方，先前農業社會又有部分者，進入洞房之後根本都是閉著眼，不敢正視對方一眼。 而天未亮之前就要出門工作，經常是十天至半個月或良久之後，才能真正見至夫君與夫人真面目，不論好壞美醜也甘之如飴，此種情況，是在婚後才開始培養夫妻恩愛感情，大部分者都比較會認命，也會心甘情願。 比較珍惜這分難得之婚姻，開始維繫著整個家庭之一切，也在於媒妁之言，根本雙方都不認識，而能組合成為一個家庭之成員，這是前人所言：女人菜籽命，隨順著男人好壞過一生，此種若依當今時代，又是天方夜譚。 倘若男人能有責任養家活口，當妻子也比較有平順安穩生活空間，也心甘情願為這個家庭付出所有青春歲月，針對古往乾坤男女婚配，是不同當下現代思想，往昔根本都聽不到有婚姻離異案例，當今時代思想不同了。 在對這種維繫著雙方美妙婚姻生活，又以 上蒼及眾仙佛來觀，才是很如實；男主外、女主內，這其中男人地位就比女人較有權利，對女人在家養育兒女，一切家庭生活重擔，就會落在女人身上。 那麽，夫君回來只知道茶來伸手、飯來張口，根本不了知女人在家所辛勞，可以言：很難認同，也認為這是應該，更是理所當然；作妻子為了給這個家庭能有更舒服生活空間，對於女人一生奉獻了青春歲月。 只為了這個家庭一切生活起居，而甘願作牛作馬，犧牲一世人之美好享受，又只為了後代子女；倘若夫君能愛護疼惜，作妻子就比較能有安適回獲，如果夫君好吃懶作又不努力之時，作女人就有苦受！ 針對每個人前世因果好壞循環，可言：女人是菜籽命此一生在自己所選擇，嫁入夫君之家中，不論好壞皆自己所選擇之命運；經由雙方不認識組合成一個家庭，往昔思想比較保守，對婚配好壞皆會心甘情願來認命。 比較能容忍以及適應雙方奇毛怪脾，如此「妻即以夫為貴」，這是中土炎黃子孫所認定觀念；又歐美國度作法也就不是如此，人生一世自己能挑選婚配對象，今可以言：歐美國度就有諸多優點，融入中土所認知觀念。 這種婚配所認定，在自己心態觀念又有很大不同；如果以夫妻恩愛情誼作基礎架構，應該不會有任何離異之觀念的，必會同對方來「相互溝通」，如何讓這個家庭有真正圓滿與融合，這是歐美國度婚姻之優點。 人世間所有婚配夫妻雙分，皆是打燈籠再找也沒有第二位人選，這種認定觀念與當今思想早已相互違背，又往昔這種婚配，是心甘情願組織一個家庭圓滿和樂；夫妻雙方皆有共同責任，維繫家庭一切圓滿興旺。 這才是很如實對夫妻兩人，各有不同責任、權利與義務來興旺這個小家庭，這是以夫妻恩愛情誼之必須性；必須了知「夫以妻為寶、妻以夫為貴」相互照顧情誼，又妻以夫為貴，這種是天經地義之事情。 理心光明禪師 題於戊戍年春節桃園佛堂 大道因果 推薦序 夫妻就會比當今時代鋁鍋或是電子鍋，所煮出來飯會特別香，這是以「古法比喻為當今」；在整個家庭夫妻成員所組合是多麼微妙，如此「桶不離箍、箍不離桶」，若是兩者欠缺其中之一項，整個家庭就不像家庭了。 就會形成諸多是妻離子散、夫敗女亡，這種痛苦情境汝等遇到否？古言「糟糠之妻不下堂」，汝等是否明白此天底下可以同汝匹配者，也只有一位而已，甚難有兩位或以上者；對婚姻來言：絕不是兒戲，必要相忍為安！ 假如夫妻不爭吵、不鬥嘴者，真稀也！更是少見！這種夫妻必須嘉獎；在人生路上相互陪伴汝一生一世當中，所有雜碎事相當良多，每一對夫妻在家庭所付出心力血汗及辛酸苦楚，真是筆墨難以言盡。 能維繫著一個家庭的圓滿興旺，是多麼不容易，在夫妻情義必要能堅志忠貞愛著對方，讓自己丈夫與妻子及兒女等，能有更大舒適安定家庭，必要雙方更大付出犧牲，來維繫整個家庭之安適生活。 不知這種觀念汝等能建立否？不一定！可試試看！必要一生一世能相親相愛，甚且鍾愛對方而不要見異思遷；人類眾生能同汝來結為夫妻者，也只有一個人而已，這個人是汝一生一世之伴侶，陪伴汝今生的。 不論再怎麽艱苦環境，能堅忍度過克服種種困難，也要能有相互照顧之情誼，深愛著對方作一生一世辛苦所回獲，這種夫妻感情能歷久彌新；如此「夫以妻為寶、妻以夫為貴」永結同心，夫妻相敬相愛直到永遠。 不要見一個愛一個，到頭來，連一個同汝白頭偕老者皆沒有，那是多麽悲哀！又汝所造之惡業、造孽債、造惡果怪得了誰，皆是自己所作所為之業障，對汝此一生所討伐，下一世仍是如此！汝要否？ 屆時後悔終生已難以改變，懊悔一生，奈何！貧賤夫妻百事哀，此種情勢，有情乾坤夫妻汝等要否？皆是不要的！人生一世對此種事情，必要能認真來改造環境，也給夫妻雙方能有努力方向，締造幸福圓滿好家庭。 倘若夫妻經常爭吵，也不要輕言離異，先靜下心來觀看著對方優點，能感恩妻子辛苦付出所有青春歲月，無怨無悔為了這一個家庭，犧牲自己成全家人，汝能感恩否？也看著夫君，整日辛苦為這個家庭來操勞。 更是辛勤打拼努力賺錢，一心想讓家庭興旺，不要有後顧之憂，也想著夫君所有優點，汝能感恩否？在人生低潮時期又該如何堅忍度過？這時候若能用感恩之心來感激對方，相信汝倆絕不會有離異之錯誤！ 也能對雙方缺點來修整及溝通，作釜底抽薪之改善，這時候夫妻雙方真心真意、真正鍾愛夫妻情誼與情義，再想想所生兒女等，若夫妻離異後，其等生活又是要如何？古人曰：嘴巴及舌頭再好，有時也會不小心咬到的！ 人類眾生所有人生所存在，不要「因上加因、果上加果、報上加報、償上加償」有情眾生無法有大方向改變，化除因緣果報相互循環，都是相當不良惡殃討報；若是如此，也就無法對「因緣果報法則」能通徹。 為何在人道世界因緣果報當中，不一定遭逢惡因果報所牽纏，往往會有很多「福運加添及道性加添」？在對有情眾生可以往上提昇超越，是由自己思想觀念可以轉化善德福報，並非一直停在往昔不正確觀念當中。 上蒼公律、天地條綱，針對每一位人類眾生進入人道世界，來做人或是其他萬物蒼生，皆是承接前世與累世種種果報之積習，而有當下今生、今世；一切過程皆是承接前世與累世種種作為加在一起。 這當中雖有部分宗教不相信因果法則，每位眾生入於人道世界之後，就一直跟隨前世與累世一切積習作為，而有今生、今世；在人為因素加入因緣果報償受，又區分為良善與惡陋，這是相當如實性！ 理心光明禪師 題於戊戍年春節桃園佛堂

title: The Invasion (Animorphs #1)
author: Applegate
K.A.
Philip Pullman
George H. Smith & Marilyn Moore
description:
Sometimes weird things 
happen to people. Ask Jake. He may tell you about the night he and his 
friends saw the strange light in the sky. He may even tell you about 
what happened when they realized the "light" was only a plane -- from 
another planet. Here's where Jake's story gets a little weird. It's 
where they're told that the human race is under attack -- and given the 
chance to fight back.Now Jake, Rachel, Cassie, Tobias, and Marco
 have the power to morph into any animal they choose. And they must use 
that power to outsmart an evil that is greater than anything the world 
has ever seen...

title: Into Battle (The Seventh Tower, Book 5)
author: Garth Nix
Compiled by: Peter R. Johnson
Mario La Torre
Gianfranco A. Vento
description: Bestselling author Garth Nix's amazing Seventh Tower series is back--now with a great new look!The Dark World is in danger, for the Veil is vulnerable. War is soon to come. On one side are Tal and the Underfolk rebels, struggling valiantly for freedom. On another side are Milla and the Icecarls, preparing to assualt the Castle in order to preserve their world. And on a third side lies the most sinister force of all--a force of evil that has only now chosen to reveal itself--a force of such power that it could unleash the ultimate destruction.

title: They Call Me Creature
author: R. L. Stine
Mark Manolopoulos
Martha L. Abell
James P. Braselton
description: Meet Laura.She's the tall girl holding two stray cats. Laura loves caring for animals. But lately, the animals in the forest near her home have been strange. Bats swarm and attack in broad daylight. On her walks, Laura hears eerie howls and inhuman cries. And now, she is about to meet another animal. An animal so ugly and evil, it can only be described as a creature. Poor Laura. Sometimes a path through the forest can lead to The Nightmare Room.

title: Liar Liar (The Nightmare Room, No. 4)
author: R. L. Stine
David Jordan
Sanat Mohanty
Ranjana Ghosh
description: That tall boy walking so confidently into the party is Ross Arthur. This isn't a surprise party, but Ross has a frightening shock in store. You see, standing across the room is Ross's identical twin. The problem? Ross doesn't have a twin. It looks as if tonight this party is being held in The Nightmare Room.

title: Star Wars: Jedi Apprentice Special Edition: The Followers
author: Watson
Jude
Watson

title: The Story of Doctor Dolittle (Books of Wonder)
author: Hugh Lofting
Richard Wittsiepe
Rob Huddleston
description: Foreword by Patricia C. McKissack and Fredrick L. McKissack. Afterword by Peter Glassman.When a swallow arrives in Puddleby-on-the-Marsh with the news that the monkeys of Africa are ill and only the doctor who talks with animals can save them, Doctor Dolittle and such good friends as Jip, his loyal dog, and Dab-Dab, his housekeeper duck, face their greatest challenge. Together they must sail to Africa, battle a band of cutthroat pirates, flee across a gorge on a bridge made of acrobatic apes, and convince the king of the beasts that even he must help an animal in need. With nearly fifty full-page pictures from Michael Hague and the McKissacks artful reworking of the dilemma faced by Prince Bumpo, this treasured story is now available in a deluxe edition that all families will want to explore again and again.

title: My Name is Evil (The Nightmare Room #3)
author: R.l. Stine
Cheryl Heckler
Eric M Dobrusin
Ronald A Krasnow
description: You hold in your hand the key to a shadow world of shivers and screams.Take a step away from the safe, comfortable world you know.  Unlock the door to terror.  There's always room for one more in...The Nightmare Room.Say Happy Birthday to Maggie O'Connor.  She's that shy, pretty girl standing outside the fortune-teller's tent.  Maggie and her friends came to the carnival for fun.  But Maggie won't be celebrating for long.  The old woman who reads her palm will soon have Maggie scraming in horror.  Because Maggie hasn't really entered a fortune-teller's tent.  She has stepped into The Nightmare Room.

title: Dear Diary, I'm Dead (Nightmare Room #5)
author: R.l. Stine
Brian Schroeder
Silvia Benso
Janet McCabe
description: You hold in your hand the key to a shadow world of shivers and screams. Take a step away from the safe, comfortable world you know. Unlock the door to terror. There's always room for one more in...The Nightmare Room.That's Alex Smith rushing past you, hurrying home to check out his journal. Why? Because Alex has never written a word in his journal, but yesterday, a mysterious entry appeared in te book--one that told Alex about the future. Alex can't wait to read the journal tonight to find out if there's anything new inside. Too bad he doesn't realize that be opening that book, he's opening the door to...The Nightmare Room.What will you find in The Nightmare Room next time? Check out book 6: They Call Me Creature.

author: Susan Cooper
B. O'Neill Wyss
Philip K. Dick
description: On his eleventh birthday Will Stanton discovers that he is the last of the Old Ones, destined to seek the six magical Signs that will enable the Old Ones to triumph over the evil forces of the Dark.

Spanning all six Star Wars movie and including the pieces of the story that fill in the gaps, this novel will be a must-have for any Star Wars fan.

author: Black Industries
Malinda Lo
George D. Painter
description: You are an Acolyte in the service of the Emperors' Inquisition. You stand in the front line of a great and secret war where your duty is to hunt out the foul stench of heresy, the vile alien, and the twisted influence of Chaos. You will tread where others fear, venturing to distant planets, ancient space hulks, and the unsavory depths of the under-hive. You will never know fame nor reward, yet if you stand resolute your deeds will be whispered to the God-Emperor of Mankind and your name will be revered for millennia! The Dark Heresy core rulebook contains everything you need to start your roleplaying adventure in the Warhammer 40,000 universe.

And right now, he’s at the helm of a giant glass elevator that’s picking up speed and hurtling through space — with Charlie and the entire Bucket family stuck inside! Roald Dahl’s uproarious sequel to Charlie and the Chocolate Factory is certain to delight and entertain a new generation of readers.

description: Tal lives high above the Dark World in an isolated mountaintop castle where light is the ultimate commodity. When one day Tal tries to steal a sunstone–the only way of assuring his family's safety–the attempt backfires, and Tal must flee the castle into the unknown.

author: Garth Nix

description: New York Times bestselling author Garth Nix's amazing Seventh Tower series is back—now with a great new look! In the final book of this spellbinding series, Tal and Milla are only one step away from death. Evil is only one step away from triumph. An old war is made new again. The ultimate power is up for grabs. As shadows rage, ancient spells return. Illusion reigns and corruption threatens. The search for hope is the bravest quest. he Seventh Tower is the key to it all.

author: George Macdonald
Vincent Phillip Munoz
Denise H. Sutton
description: Princess Irene lives in a castle in a wild and lonely mountainous region. One day she discovers a steep and winding stairway leading to a bewildering labyrinth of unused passages with closed doors - and a further stairway. What lies at the top? Can the ring the princess is given protect her against the lurking menace of the boglins from under the mountain? This complete an unabridged edition of "The Princess and the Goblin" is an ageless story of magic and mystery.

description: Discover the original, bone-chilling adventures that made Goosebumps one of the bestselling children's book series of all time. Now with bonus features!  Something scary is happening in GOOSEBUMPS HORRORLAND, the all-new, all-terrifying series by R. L. Stine. Just how scary? You'll never know unless you crack open this classic prequel! Carly Beth thinks she's found the best Halloween mask ever. With yellow-green skin and long animal fangs, the mask terrifies the entire neighborhood. Before long, it has a surprising effect on Carly Beth, too. She tries to take it off . . . but it won't budge! Halloween is almost over, but fright night is just beginning. Now with all-new bonus materials!

description: When the 5000-year-old djinni Bartimaeus is summoned by Nathaniel, a young magician's apprentice, he expects to have to do nothing more taxing than a little levitation or a few simple illusions. But Nathaniel is a precocious talent and has something rather more dangerous in mind: revenge. Against his will, Bartimaeus is packed off to steal the powerful Amulet of Samarkand from Simon Lovelace, a master magician of unrivalled ruthlessness and ambition. Before long, both djinni and apprentice are caught up in a terrifying flood of magical intrigue, murder and rebellion.

description: The fantastic prequel trilogy to the bestselling series GUARDIANS OF GA'HOOLE begins!It is a time of Legends and a time of chaos. Warlords vie for power and marauding outlaws roam the land. Good King Hrath and his queen, Siv, noble Spotted Owls struggle to keep peace in their kingdom. Grank, noble Spotted Owl, friend and supporter of King Hrath, has exiled himself to Beyond the Beyond, where he has developed his firesight and learns how to work with embers, fire and how to forge metals. He is the First Collier. Deep in a volcano in the farthest reaches of Beyond the Beyond, he discovers a magical Ember but fears its awful powers will be misused and hides it again.  (continued)

If you've read the other Skulduggery Pleasant books by Derek Landy (and you really should have read them by now), you've seen it all before: Some bad guy wants to bring about the end of the world, and Skulduggery and Valkyrie fight valiantly to stop it from happening. A few people get hurt, sure, but everything's all right in the end.   Well, not this time.

description: Hailey and Claire are spending their last summer together when they discover something at the bottom of the murky pool at the Capri Beach Club. There in the depths is a mysterious and beautiful creature with a sharp tongue and a broken heart: a mermaid named Aquamarine who has left her six sisters to search for love on land. Now, as this mythological yet very real being starts to fade in the burning August sun, a rescue is begun.On the edge of growing up, during a summer that is the hottest on record, Hailey and Claire are discovering that life can take an unpredictable course, friendship is forever, and magic can be found in the most unexpected places.

Cette année, Harry a dix-sept ans et ne retourne pas à Poudlard. Avec 
Ron et Hermione, il se consacre à la dernière mission confiée par 
Dumbledore. Mais le Seigneur des Ténèbres règne en maître. Traqués, les 
trois fidèles amis sont contraints à la clandestinité. D'épreuves en 
révélations, le courage, les choix et les sacrifices de Harry seront 
déterminants dans la lutte contre les forces du Mal.

title: The Book of Three (The Chronicles of Prydain Book 1)
author: Lloyd Alexander
Victor Hugo
Anirudh Krishna
description: The Newbery-winning fantasy series now available in gorgeous new paperback editions! Since The Book of Three was first published in 1964, young readers have been enthralled by the adventures of Taran the Assistant Pig-Keeper and his quest to become a hero. Taran is joined by an engaging cast of characters that includes Eilonwy, the strong-willed and sharp-tongued princess; Fflewddur Fflam, the hyperbole-prone bard; the ever-faithful Gurgi; and the curmudgeonly Doli--all of whom have become involved in an epic struggle between good and evil that shapes the fate of the legendary land of Prydain. Released over a period of five years, Lloyd Alexander's beautifully written tales not only captured children's imaginations but also garnered the highest critical praise. The Black Cauldron was a Newbery Honor Book, and the final volume in the chronicles, The High King, crowned the series by winning the Newbery Medal for "the most distinguished contribution to American literature for children."Henry Holt is proud to present this classic series in a new, redesigned paperback format. The jackets feature stunning art by acclaimed fantasy artist David Wyatt, giving the books a fresh look for today's generation of young fantasy lovers. The companion book of short stories, The Foundling is also available in paperback at this time. In their more than thirty years in print, the Chronicles of Prydain have become the standard of excellence in fantasy literature for children.
publisher: Henry Holt and Co. BYR Paperbacks

title: Bone silence
author: Alastair Reynolds
Stephen Baxter
Wilhelm C. Miller & Allan H. Robbins
description:
Quoins are accepted 
currency throughout the thousands of worlds of the Congregation. 
Ancient, and of unknown origin and purpose, people have traded with 
them, fought for them, and stolen quoin hordes from booby-trapped caches
 at risk to life and limb throughout the Thirteen Occupations. Only now 
it's becoming clear they have another purpose . . . as do the bankers 
who've been collecting them.The Occupations themselves are another 
puzzle. The rise and fall of civilisation may have been unevenly spaced 
across history, but there is also a pattern. Could something be sparking
 the Occupations - or ending them? And if so, what could it be, lurking 
far beyond the outermost worlds of the Congregation?The Ness sisters
 are being hunted for crimes they didn't commit by a fleet whose crimes 
are worse than their own. If they're to survive, and stay one step ahead
 of their pursuers - if they're to answer the questions which have 
plagued them - it's going to require every dirty, piratical trick in the
 book...

description: The Kate Greenaway Medal winner--now in paperback!    Welcome back to a Wonderland that is as astonishingly new as it is joyously familiar. Helen Oxenbury, one of the world’s most acclaimed illustrators, brings her special brand of magic to the Lewis Carroll classic in a handsome volume boasting more illustrations than any other edition - called a "masterpiece" by Parents’ Choice. Her Wonderland is exuberant, contemporary, and lovingly created, with all the warmth, depth of emotion, humor, and acute observations of people and animals for which the artist’s work is so highly regarded. An elegant, textured cover with flaps makes this a beautiful gift book.  "Oxenbury applies her finely honed instinct for a child’s perspective to create an Alice accessible to all ages. . . . An ideal first introduction to a lifelong favorite read." - PUBLISHERS WEEKLY (starred review)

description: Skulduggery and Valkyrie are facing a new enemy: Baron Vengeous, who is determined to bring back the terrifying Faceless Ones and is crafting an army of evil to help him. Added to that, Vengeous is about to enlist a new ally (if he can raise it from the dead): the horrible Grotesquery, a very unlikable monster of legend.   Once Vengeous is on the loose, dead bodies and vampires start showing up all over Ireland. Now pretty much everybody is out to kill Valkyrie, and the daring detective duo faces its biggest challenge yet.   But what if the greatest threat to Valkyrie is just a little closer to home?   Look for Scepter of the Ancients

description: For the first time in publishing history readers can enjoy the complete works of Sheridan Le Fanu, the leading ghost-story writer of the nineteenth century, whose groundbreaking works were central to the development of the Gothic genre in the Victorian era. This comprehensive eBook is complemented with numerous illustrations, informative introductions, scarce texts and the usual Delphi bonus material. (Version 2) * Beautifully illustrated with images relating to Le Fanu's life and works * Concise introductions to the novels and other texts * ALL 14 novels, with individual contents tables * Rare novels like THE FORTUNES OF COLONEL TORLOGH O’BRIEN appearing for the first time in digital publishing history * Images of how the books were first printed, giving your eReader a taste of the original texts * Excellent formatting of the texts * Several novels are fully illustrated with their original artwork * Rare novellas from CHRONICLES OF GOLDEN FRIARS, available nowhere else * The complete 54 short stories – with many supernatural tales appearing here for the first time * Special chronological and alphabetical contents tables for the short stories * Includes Le Fanu's poetry and memoir - spend hours exploring the author’s diverse works * Special criticism section, with two detailed essays evaluating Le Fanu’s contribution to literature * Scholarly ordering of texts into chronological order and literary genres * UPDATED with 8 rare uncollected short stories, appearing in digital print for the first time Please visit www.delphiclassics.com to browse through our range of exciting titles CONTENTS: The Novels THE COCK AND ANCHOR THE FORTUNES OF COLONEL TORLOGH O’BRIEN THE HOUSE BY THE CHURCH-YARD WYLDER’S HAND UNCLE SILAS GUY DEVERELL ALL IN THE DARK THE TENANTS OF MALORY A LOST NAME HAUNTED LIVES THE WYVERN MYSTERY CHECKMATE THE ROSE AND THE KEY WILLING TO DIE The Shorter Fiction THE PURCELL PAPERS GHOST STORIES AND TALES OF MYSTERY GHOSTLY TALES CHRONICLES OF GOLDEN FRIARS IN A GLASS DARKLY SPALATRO A STABLE FOR NIGHTMARES UNCOLLECTED TALES The Tales LIST OF TALES IN CHRONOLOGICAL ORDER LIST OF TALES IN ALPHABETICAL ORDER The Poems THE POETRY OF SHERIDAN LE FANU The Criticism A FORGOTTEN CREATOR OF GHOSTS: JOSEPH SHERIDAN LE FANU by Edna Kenton SHERIDAN LE FANU by E. F. Benson The Memoir MEMOIR OF JOSEPH SHERIDAN LE FANU Please visit www.delphiclassics.com to browse through our range of exciting titles

title: If You're Reading This, It's Too Late
author: Pseudonymous Bosch
Vandermeer
Jeff
O'Hehir
Diana
description: Beware! Dangerous secrets lie between the pages of this book. OK, I warned you. But if you think I'll give anything away, or tell you that this is the sequel to my first literary endeavor, The Name of This Book is Secret, you're wrong. I'm not going to remind you of how we last left our heroes, Cass and Max-Ernest, as they awaited intiation into the mysterious Terces Society, or the ongoing fight against the evil Dr. L and Ms. Mauvais. I certainly won't be telling you about how the kids stumble upon the Museum of Magic, where they finally meet the amazing Pietro! Oh, blast! I've done it again. Well, at least I didn't tell you about the missing Sound Prism, the nefarious Lord Pharaoh, or the mysterious creature born in a bottle over 500 years ago, the key to the biggest secret of all. I really can't help myself, now can I? Let's face it---if you're reading this, it's too late.
publisher: Little, Brown Books for Young Readers

title: The Mystery of the Whispering Mummy (Three Investigators)
author: Robert Arthur
James P. Sterba
Robert A. Logan

title: Hex Hall Book One                                  Reading age ‏ : ‎ 18 years and up
author: Hawkins
Rachel
Hawkins
Rachel
Hawkins
Rachel
description:
Three years ago, Sophie Mercer discovered that she was a witch. It's 
gotten her into a few scrapes. Her non-gifted mother has been as 
supportive as possible, consulting Sophie's estranged father-an elusive 
European warlock-only when necessary. But when Sophie attracts too much 
human attention for a prom-night spell gone horribly wrong, it's her dad
 who decides her punishment: exile to Hex Hall, an isolated reform 
school for wayward Prodigium, a.k.a. witches, faeries, and 
shapeshifters. By the end of her first day among fellow freak-teens, 
Sophie has quite a scorecard: three powerful enemies who look like 
supermodels, a futile crush on a gorgeous warlock, a creepy tagalong 
ghost, and a new roommate who happens to be the most hated person and 
only vampire on campus. Worse, Sophie soon learns that a mysterious 
predator has been attacking students, and her only friend is the 
number-one suspect. As a series of blood-curdling mysteries 
starts to converge, Sophie prepares for the biggest threat of all: an 
ancient secret society determined to destroy all Prodigium, especially her.

title: Aenir (The Seventh Tower, Book 3)
author: Garth Nix
Don DeLillo
Reza R. Dibadj
description: The dream world Aenir is not a safe place.  One wrong step can lead to danger, entrapment...or death.  Tal and Milla must fight their way through this shifting landscape.  They are searching for the Codex, a magical object that will decide the fate of their worlds.  Many creatures stand in their way--from the cloud-flesh Storm Shepherds to a swarm of venomous Waspwyrms to a horrifying figure named Hazror.  Tal and Milla cannot leave Aenir without the Codex.  But finding it might endanger them more than they've ever dreamed...

title: Johnny and the Dead
author: Terry Pratchett
Trumbo
Dalton
Terry Pratchett
description:
Not many people can see the dead (not many would want to). 
Twelve-year-old Johnny Maxwell can. And he's got bad news for them: the 
council want to sell the cemetery as a building site. But the dead have 
learnt a thing or two from Johnny. They're not going to take it lying 
down . . . especially since it's Halloween tomorrow. Besides, 
they're beginning to find that life is a lot more fun than it was when 
they were . . . well . . . alive. Particularly if they break a few rules
 . .

title: Inkspell
author: Cornelia Funke
Tess Gerritsen
Lucian (of Samosata.)
Joel B. Itzkowitz
description: Although a year has passed, not a day goes by without Meggie thinking of Inkheart, the book whose characters came to life - and changed her life forever.But for Dustfinger, the fire-eater brought into being from words, the need to return to the original tale has become desperate.  When he finds a crooked storyteller with the magical ability to read him back, Dustfinger leaves behind his young apprentice Farid and plunges into the medieval inkscape once more.Distraught, Farid goes in search of Meggie, and before long both are caught inside the book, too.  There they meet Inkheart's author, Fenoglio, now living within his own story.  But the tale is much changed, and threatening to evolve in ways none of them would have ever imagined.  Will Meggie, Farid, and Fenoglio manage to write the wrongs of a charmed world?  Or is their story on the brink of a very bad ending?

title: Goosebumps
author: R. L. Stine
Sam Eastland
Catherine O'Sullivan
description: Jordan Blake and his sister, Nicole, are sick of the hot weather in Pasadena, California. Just once they'd like to have a real winter. A real winter with real snow. And then, it happens. The Blakes are taking a trip to Alaska! Mr. Blake has been asked to photograph a mysterious snow creature there. Poor Jordan and Nicole - they just wanted to see snow. But now, they're being chased by a monstrous creature. A big furry-faced Creature...known as the Abominable Snowman!

title: The Haunted Mask (Goosebumps #11, Classic Goosebumps #4,)
author: Stine
R L
Stine
R L
Stine
R L
description: Discover the original, bone-chilling adventures that made Goosebumps one of the bestselling children's book series of all time. Now with bonus features!  Something scary is happening in GOOSEBUMPS HORRORLAND, the all-new, all-terrifying series by R. L. Stine. Just how scary? You'll never know unless you crack open this classic prequel! Carly Beth thinks she's found the best Halloween mask ever. With yellow-green skin and long animal fangs, the mask terrifies the entire neighborhood. Before long, it has a surprising effect on Carly Beth, too. She tries to take it off . . . but it won't budge! Halloween is almost over, but fright night is just beginning. Now with all-new bonus materials!

title: The Ruins of Gorlan
author: Flanagan
John
Flanagan
John
Flanagan
John
description: They have always scared him in the past — the Rangers, with their dark cloaks and shadowy ways. The villagers believe the Rangers practice magic that makes them invisible to ordinary people. And now 15-year-old Will, always small for his age, has been chosen as a Ranger's apprentice. What he doesn't yet realize is that the Rangers are the protectors of the kingdom. Highly trained in the skills of battle and surveillance, they fight the battles before the battles reach the people. And as Will is about to learn, there is a large battle brewing. The exiled Morgarath, Lord of the Mountains of Rain and Night, is gathering his forces for an attack on the kingdom. This time, he will not be denied....

title: Goosebumps The Curse of Camp Cold Lake
author: Stine
R L
Stine
R L
Stine
R L

title: Tales of Mystery and Imagination
author: Edgar Allen Poe
Rolf Wester (auth.)
Reinhart Poprawe (eds.)
Shel Silverstein
description: Spiral down dimly lit streets liined with madmen and their black deeds, through cold twists of catacombs, and across a sea that strikes with tight, angry fists. From the tortured mind of Edgar Allan Poe, three tales--"The Cask of Amontillado, " "The Black Cat, " and "The Fall of the House of Usher"--speak to the hidden places within us all. 20 full-color illustrations.

title: Artemis Fowl, Book 03 The Eternity Code
author: Eoin Colfer
Harold G. Marcus
Patricia Briggs
description: After being held prisoner for years, Artemis Fowl's father has finally come home. He is a new man-an honest man, much to Artemis's horror. He makes his son promise to give up his life of crime, and Artemis has to go along with it. But not until he has completed one last scheme. Artemis has constructed a super-computer from stolen fairy technology. Called the "C Cube," it will render all existing human technology obsolete. He arranges a meeting with a powerful Chicago businessman, Jon Spiro, to broker a deal for the C Cube. But Spiro springs a trap-he steals the C Cube and mortally injures Butler. Artemis knows his only hope of saving his loyal bodyguard is to employ fairy magic; so once again he must contact his old rival, Captain Holly Short of the LEPrecon fairy police. It is going to take a miracle to save Butler, and Artemis's luck may have just run out.

title: The Hobbit (Comic)
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
David Wenzel
Elmar Heinzle
Arno P. Biwer
Charles L. Cooney
Arnold E. Stuetz
description: First published in the United States more than sixty years ago, J. R. R. Tolkien's The Hobbit has become one of the best-loved books of all time. Tolkien's fantasy was then adapted into a fully painted graphic novel, which became a classic in its own right...The enchanted prelude to The Lord of the Rings, The Hobbit is the story of Bilbo Baggins, a quiet and contented hobbit whose life is turned upside down when he joins the wizard Gandalf and thirteen dwarves on their quest to reclaim stolen treasure. It is a journey fraught with danger—and in the end it is bilbo Baggins alone who must face the guardian of this treasure, the most dreaded dragon in all Middle-earth.

title: Say Cheese and Die--Again!
author: R. L. Stine
Charles S. Maier
Fatmagül Demirel
description: They're baa-ack! Make way for the bestselling children's series of all time! With a fresh new look, GOOSEBUMPS is set to scare a whole new generation of kids.  So reader beware--you're in for a scare!A PICTURE-PERFECT NIGHTMARE…Sourball.  That's what Greg calls his English teacher, Mr. Saur.  He's a real grouch.  And he just gave Greg a big fat "F" on his oral report.  He didn't believe Greg's story.  About the camera Greg found last summer.  About the pictures it took.  About the evil things that happened. Poor Greg.  He just wanted to prove old Sourball wrong.  But now that he's dug up the camera, bad things are happening.  Really bad things.  Just like the first time....

title: Percy Jackson and the Olympians 4 - The Battle of the Labyrinth
author: Rick Riordan
Randall & Reilly
Mark W. Huth
description: Percy Jackson isn’t expecting freshman orientation to be any fun.  But when a mysterious mortal acquaintance appears on campus, followed by demon cheerleaders, things quickly move from bad to diabolical.In this latest installment of the blockbuster series, time is running out as war between the Olympians and the evil Titan lord Kronos draws near. Even the safe haven of Camp Half-Blood grows more vulnerable by the minute as Kronos’s army prepares to invade its once impenetrable borders. To stop them, Percy and his demigod friends must set out on a quest through the Labyrinth—a sprawling underground world with stunning surprises at every turn. Full of humor and heart-pounding action, this fourth book promises to be their most thrilling adventure yet.

title: Charlie and the chocolate factory
author: Dahl Roald
Editions Vaillant
Ferber
description: The gates of Willy Wonka?s chocolate factory are opening at last . . . and only five children will be allowed inside.

title: Artemis Fowl, Book 6 The Time Paradox
author: Eoin Colfer
Ian Markham
William Lilly
description: Artemis's mother has contracted a deadly disease--and the only cure lies in the brain fluid of  African lemurs. Unfortunately, Artemis himself was responsible for making the lemurs extinct five years ago. Now he must enlist the aid of his fairy friends to travel back in time and save the lemur. Not only that, but he must face his deadliest foe yet: his younger self.

title: Coraline Graphic Novel
author: Neil Gaiman
L. Bostock
F.S. Chandler
Sheila O'Connor
description: When Coraline steps through a door in her family's new house, she finds another house, strangely similar to her own (only better). At first, things seem marvelous. The food is better than at home, and the toy box is filled with fluttering wind-up angels and dinosaur skulls that crawl and rattle their teeth.   But there's another mother there and another father, and they want her to stay and be their little girl. They want to change her and never let her go. Coraline will have to fight with all her wit and all the tools she can find if she is to save herself and return to her ordinary life.   This beloved tale has now become a visual feast. Acclaimed artist P. Craig Russell brings Neil Gaiman's enchanting nationally bestselling children's book Coraline to new life in this gorgeously illustrated graphic novel adaptation.

title: The Titan's Curse (Percy Jackson and the Olympians, Book 3)
author: Rick Riordan
Jean-Philippe Stassen
Xiaolu Zhu
Rangaraj M. Rangayyan
and Anna L. Ells
description: When the goddess Artemis goes missing, she is believed to have been kidnapped. And now it’s up to Percy and his friends to find out what happened. Who is powerful enough to kidnap a goddess?  They must find Artemis before the winter solstice, when her influence on the Olympian Council could swing an important vote on the war with the titans. Not only that, but first Percy will have to solve the mystery of a rare monster that Artemis was hunting when she disappeared—a monster rumored to be so powerful it could destroy Olympus forever.

title: Oceans (DK ONLINE)
author: John Woodward
Pierre Verstraeten
Isabelle Stengers
Janaki R.R. Alavalapati
D. Evan Mercer
description: DK, the best reference publisher, meets Google(tm), the world's   best search engine in a comprehensive and authoritative series that's online,   and sets the benchmark for reference. Providing complete and visually arresting   reference at an entirely new level, e-links lead you to online information you   can't get in a book: live and archival footage; sound buttons; interactive polls,   quizzes, and games; links to organizations and the latest research. Each e-link   tells you which keyword to use-then Google(tm) / DK take you straight to the   safe, appropriate, and accurate online information.      Discover the incredible abundance and variety of plants and animals that make   the ocean their home-from deep, dark trenches, to lush, tropical atolls. Also   learn about the currents, cycles, and life of the ocean itself, and how the   health of the ocean affects life everywhere on the planet
categories: Children's Books - Science, Nature & How It Works

title: Brightly Woven
author: Alexandra Bracken
Dr. Samuel Greitzer
Herbert Feith
description: When Wayland North brings rain to a region that's been dry for over ten years, he's promised anything he'd like as a reward. He chooses the village elder's daughter, sixteen-year-old Sydelle Mirabel, who is a skilled weaver and has an unusual knack for repairing his magical cloaks. Though Sydelle has dreamt of escaping her home, she's hurt that her parents relinquish her so freely and finds herself awed and afraid of the slightly ragtag wizard who is unlike any of the men of magic in the tales she's heard. Still, she is drawn to this mysterious man who is fiercely protective of her and so reluctant to share his own past. The pair rushes toward the capital, intent to stop an imminent war, pursued by Reuel Dorwan (a dark wizard who has taken a keen interest in Sydelle) and plagued by unusually wild weather. But the sudden earthquakes and freak snowstorms may not be a coincidence. As Sydelle discovers North's dark secret and the reason for his interest in her and learns to master her own mysterious power, it becomes increasingly clear that the fate of the kingdom rests in her fingertips. She will either be a savior, weaving together the frayed bonds between Saldorra and Auster, or the disastrous force that destroys both kingdoms forever.
categories: Children's Books - Science, Nature & How It Works

title: The Dangerous Days of Daniel X
author: James Patterson
J. A. S. Evans
Colleen Lamos
description: Yes, it's true: Daniel X is special. X-traordinarily special.He may be just a kid, but Daniel is strong enough to fight anything in the world. And it's a good thing, because not many guys you meet have a host of deadly criminals hunting them to the ends of the Earth. And none of them are extraterrestrials. Daniel is the only one who might be able to eliminate every last intergalactic evil on the List of Alien Outlaws on Terra Firma. Because the greatest superpower isn't to be part spider and part man, or to cast magic spells - the ultimate gift is the power to create.

title: Artemis Fowl Book 5 The Lost Colony
author: Eoin Colfer
Craig Dove
William F. Trench
description: Demons are beginning to materialize without warning on Earth.  If humans were to capture one, all fairies would be exposed. In order to protect themselves, the fairies must decipher complicated equations to determine where the next demon will appear.  Not even the brilliant Foaly can make heads or tails of the formulas – but he knows someone who can: Artemis Fowl.When a very confused demon imp appears in a Sicilian theater, Artemis is there to meet him.  But he is not alone.  Someone else has unlocked the secrets of the fairy world…and she is only twelve years old. Now, in a race against time, a newly-reformed Artemis Fowl will have to dip into his bag of dirty tricks if he is to save his fairy friends from his latest nemesis, not to mention a power hungry demon warlord who is poised to invade our dimension with his savage army.

You can study the different functions, areas, and states of the brain, and at each stage, there are cool games, quizzes, puzzles, brain teasers, and more! The activities show readers how their brains can work even better, making this a challenging, informative, and practical book; the only one of its kind on the market.

title: Amazing Rubber Band Cars: Easy-to-Build Wind-Up Racers, Models, and Toys
author: Mike Rigsby
Derek Leroith (Eds.)
N.C. Brady (Eds.)
description: Combining fun and interactive activities, this guide will have kids captivated for hours constructing fantastic racing cars with the basics of only rubber bands, cardboard, and glue. These simple instructions with templates allow budding engineers to gain hands-on experience as they learn not only how to build a basic racer, but how to make modifications such as aluminum foil axle bearings, steering mechanisms, hinges, cam shafts, and wheels made out of old CDs. This helpful resource has step-by-step instructions for making a basic rubber-band model, a railroad push-car, and a high-speed racer. Other unique projects include Oscar the Laughing Clown, which has a jaw mechanism that opens and closes when it moves, and Spot the Dog, which has a moving tail. Children can even learn how to build a rubber band car big enough for a human. Exploring wheels, bearings, and friction, kids will learn not only how to make speedy racers but also the science that makes the process work.
categories: Children's Books - Science, Nature & How It Works

title: A Song of Ice and Fire
author: George R R Martin
di bello - e-Commerce con wordpress e woocommerce
王瑞珠
description:
An e-book containing all five A Song of Ice and Fire books.

Summers has spanned for decades, but Winter can last a lifetime. And with endless winter comming, the struggle for the Iron Throne has ensued. A struggle stretched from the south, where heat breeds plot, lusts and intrigues, to the vast frozen north, where a magnificent wall of ice protects the kingdom from the dark forces that lie beyond.
Kings and queens, knights and renegades, liars, lords and honest men. All have come to play the Game of Thrones.
And in this Game... You win, or you die.

title: Janice VanCleave's Animals
author: Janice VanCleave
Richard B. Pelzer
Pal Brekke (auth.)
description: The perfect science fair idea books . . .Spectacular Science Projects How do birds eat without teeth? What is in a whale's spout? How were dinosaur tracks formed?Janice VanCleave's Animals includes 20 fun and simple experiments that allow you to discover the answers to these and other fascinating questions about animals, plus dozens of additional suggestions for developing your own science fair projects.Learn about fossil formation with a simple experiment using cornmeal and flour; about reflex actions using cotton balls; about animal hearing with a metal pie pan, salt, and a spoon; and much more. All experiments use inexpensive household materials and involve a minimum of preparation and cleanup.Children ages 8-12Also available in the Spectacular Science Projects series: Janice VanCleave's Earthquakes Janice VanCleave's Electricity Janice VanCleave's Gravity Janice VanCleave's Machines Janice VanCleave's Magnets Janice VanCleave's Microscopes and Magnifying Lenses Janice VanCleave's Molecules Janice VanCleave's Plants Janice VanCleave's Rocks and Minerals Janice VanCleave's Volcanoes Janice VanCleave's Weather

title: Why Is Milk White?: & 200 Other Curious Chemistry Questions
author: Alexa Coelho
Simon Quellen Field
H. G. Henneberg (auth.)
Professor Fernando Sansò
Professor Antonio J. Gil (eds.)
Trevor Yorke
description: Covering a wide variety of everyday chemistry concepts from the very simple to the more complex, this question-and-answer primer provides straightforward, easy-to-understand explanations for inquisitive young scientists’ questions. A dozen unique experiments to try at home—from lifting latent fingerprints from a “crime scene” using super glue (for smooth surfaces) or iodine (for paper) to hollowing out the zinc interior of a penny using muriatic acid—are interspersed with the answers to such questions as What makes soda so fizzy? and Why do you get cavities when you eat too much sugar? From separating food coloring into its component dyes to using easy-to-find chemicals to create “slime,” Silly Putty, or bouncing balls, this handy guide is the ideal resource for the budding chemist.

author: Richard Walker

Lars Carlsen
description: From blistering bee stings to pus-filled pimples, this eye-popping book takes readers on a virtual tour of all of the grossest, gooiest, and most fascinating events that bodies have to endure. Featuring incredible 3-D graphics that reveal the action and body's response in microscopic detail, Ouch! Combines kid-friendly gross-out value with cutting-edge anatomical and biological expertise.
categories: Children's Books - Science, Nature & How It Works

title: Isaac Newton and Physics for Kids: His Life and Ideas with 21 Activities
author: Kerrie Logan Hollihan
David Kilcullen
Nicolaas Christiaan Veldhuis
description: Isaac Newton was as strange as he was intelligent. In a few short years, he made astounding discoveries in physics, astronomy, optics, and mathematics yet never told a soul. Though isolated, snobbish, and jealous, he almost single-handedly changed the course of scientific advancement and ushered in the Enlightenment. Newton invented the refracting telescope, explained the motion of planets and comets, discovered the multicolored nature of light, and created an entirely new field of mathematical understanding: calculus. The world might have been a very different place had Netwon’s theories and observations not been coaxed out of him by his colleagues. Isaac Newton and Physics for Kids paints a rich portrait of this brilliant and complex man, including 21 hands-on projects that explore the scientific concepts Newton developed and the times in which he lived. Readers will build a simple waterwheel, create a 17thcentury plague mask, track the phases of the moon, and test Newton’s Three Laws of Motion using coins, a skateboard, and a model boat they construct themselves. The text includes a time line, online resources, and reading list for further study. And through it all, readers will learn how the son of a Woolsthorpe sheep farmer grew to become the most influential physicist in history.
categories: Children's Books - Science, Nature & How It Works

title: Volcano (Eye Wonder)

Robert H. Griffin

Interspersed with history, factoids, and sidebars, this engaging reference explores scientific concepts, such as the formation of coral reefs and the cause of volcanic eruptions. Each monument—from the Lava Beds to the Petrified Forest—is showcased in a graphic multipage spread and is followed by hands-on experiments, allowing children to make their own stalactites and discover how a river can erode rock into a canyon. Expressing true appreciation for the United States' natural wonders, this comprehensive guide clearly illustrates their formation, from glittering caves to giant trees.

title: The Anti-Pirate Potato Cannon: And 101 Other Things for Young Mariners to Build, Try, and Do on the Water
author: David Seidman

description: Spark a passion for sailing and the outdoors in your child    Ever since humankind began seafaring, boats and shoreline adventures have produced sturdy, independent, creative, self-reliant kids. From the author of the bestselling Complete Sailor and proud father of a boy mariner, here is the book for all parents who want to introduce their kids to the world of boats, boating, sailing, the shore, and the sea. It provides dozens of adventures and activities for kids, and a plethora of projects for you and your kids to do together.           Topics range from how-to to fanciful, in random organization so that each excursion into the book turns up unrelated gems on facing pages. The Anti-Pirate Potato Cannon encourages your kid to get outdoors and on the water, to build things, to try things, to cultivate their curiosity, to learn self-reliance, and to get a giant dose of the magic of seaside adventure.            Loaded with things for kids to do--build a rope ladder; build a Huck Finn raft from PVC pipe; catch and fillet a fish; go crabbing; skip a stone; body surf; waterski on bare feet; chart a cove; learn the great sea battles; build a sandcastle; navigate; win a sailboat race; paddle a sea kayak; and a whole lot more.    Designed to cultivate a kid's curiosity about the natural world.            Topics include:    Where's the wind coming from; How high is that wave; An anti-pirate potato cannon; Brew your own biofuel;  Make a dugout canoe; Build a Huck Finn raft from PVC pipe; Skip a stone; Build a sandcastle; Carve a paddle; Row a boat Escape a rip current; Go kite sailing; Navigate by the stars; Carve a half-hull model; What's on the bottom; A journey to the abyss; Don't wrestle an alligator; A dinghy camper; How to dive with mask and snorkel; Build a motorboat from cardboard tubes; Body surf; Recognize ships; Discipline in the Age of Sail: cat-o-nine tails, hanging from the yardarms; Steer without a rudder; Chapter 25. Tie up to a dock; Reading a lines drawing; Whatever floats your boat; Play nautical capture the flag;  Paddle a sea kayas; Build a rowboat; Signal across the water; Capture plankton in a net; Tie knots and splices; Make a rope ladder; Make a chart of your favorite cove; Throw your own beach clam bake; Make a catboat-race weather vane; Fight off a shark; Heave a monkey's fist; Ski on your own bare feet; Fillet a fish... and cook it on your engine; Your own ditty bag; A proper sailor's knife; How to stand up on a PWC; How to get up on a wakeboard; Go clamming; Build a human pyramid on water skis; How to poop in a boat: How marine heads work; Diver's tube raft; Submarine a PWC; Survive a sinking; Finding east or west All you need is the north star; The bosun's pipe; Ships in a bottle; Five sea battles that changed history; Use the five secrets of winning a sailboat race; Make a viewing bucket to see underwater; Cast a fly; Survive a hurricane; The Eskimo roll; Stow that chart; Goggles from a soda bottle; Find fish fast; Repair a sail; Whalewatching; Go on a plastics hunt; Don't be left in the dark; Pets at sea: how to train your cat or dog for boating; The green and clean boat; Ride the disk; Go crabbing; Careers at sea; Pass your boating license exam; Origins of sea terms; The best way to coil rope; Carve a slalom turn; Keeping watch; Throwing a cast net; Keep what you catch - start an aquarium; Heroes of the Sea: Shackleton, Slocum, Day, Knox-Johnston, Heyerdahl, etc.; Books & Stories (Three Men in a Boat, Crunch and Des, Riddle of the Sands, Swallows and Amazons); Stage paintball sea battles; Read the messages in clouds; Get unlost in the fog: sager forecaster; Know how to handle waves; Semaphore signals; Glacier surfing; Great voyages by young mariners;  Make a weather station

title: Boats, Ships, Submarines: and Other Floating Machines (How Things Work)
author: Ian Graham
